12.verse: enti ne dɔ so ntew. W’ankasa, O Awurade, tua obiara ka sɛnea ne nneyɛe te pɛpɛɛpɛ.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn ho anigyina - O Onyankopɔn, woyɛ me Nyankopɔn na m’ani agyina wo. Me nipadua nyinaa hwehwɛ wo te sɛ asase a ɛso awo na srade ne nsu nni mu. Wo ho sukɔn de me kra.

2.verse: Ma minhu wo wɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ; ma minhu sɛ woyɛ ɔkɛse ne onuonyamfo.

3.verse: Wo dɔ a wodɔ daa no ye sen nkwa ankasa mpo, enti mɛkamfo wo.

4.verse: Sɛ mete ase yi, mɛda wo ase. Mɛma me nsa so abɔ wo mpae.

5.verse: Me kra bedidi na amee na mɛto anigye nnwom ayi wo ayɛ.

6.verse: Meda mpa so nyinaa, mekae wo. Anadwo nyinaa, midwen wo ho

7.verse: efisɛ, daa woyɛ me boafo. Wo ntaban ase nwini mu na mɛto anigye dwom.

8.verse: Me bata wo ho na wo nsa hwɛ me so yiye.

9.verse: Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wokum me no bɛkɔ asaman ase pɛɛ.

10.verse: Wobekum wɔn wɔ ɔko mu na mpataku awe wɔn nam.

11.verse: Esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn ma no nkonim nti, ɔhene no benya ahosɛpɛw. Wɔn a wɔhyɛ bɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn din mu no bɛkamfo no, nanso atorofo ano de, wɔbɛto mu.

1.verse: Ogye ho mpaebɔ - Mewɔ ɔhaw mu, Onyankopɔn, na tie me mpaebɔ! Misuro m’atamfo; gye me nkwa.

2.verse: Bɔ me ho ban fi amumɔyɛfo ne nnebɔneyɛfo dɔm nsam.

3.verse: Wɔsew wɔn tɛkrɛma sɛ nkrante na wɔpɛ atirimɔden nsɛm te sɛ agyan.

4.verse: Wɔnkyɛ atorosɛm a wɔn ani nwu ne ka ho. Wɔka nnipa pa ho nsɛm a enye de sopa wɔn.

5.verse: Wɔhyɛ wɔn ho nkuran wɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ nneyɛe ho. Wodwen baabi a wobesum wɔn firi ho na wɔka se, “Obiara renhu wɔn.”

6.verse: Wɔhyehyɛ amumɔyɛ ho ka se, “Bɔne nhyehyɛe a yɛayɛ yi ho nni asɛm.” Onipa koma ne n’adwene yɛ anwonwade.

7.verse: Nanso Onyankopɔn tow n’agyan kyerɛ wɔn so, na prɛkopɛ, wopirapira.

8.verse: Saa nsɛm no nti, ɔbɛsɛe wɔn. Wɔn a wohu wɔn nyinaa bɛwosow wɔn ti.

9.verse: Wɔn nyinaa besuro. Wobedwen nea Onyankopɔn ayɛ ho na wɔaka dwuma a odi.

10.verse: Atreneefo nyinaa ho bɛsɛpɛw wɔn wɔ nea Awurade ayɛ ho. Wobenya nkwagye wɔ ne mu na nnipa pa nyinaa bɛkamfo no.

1.verse: Ayeyi ne aseda - O Onyankopɔn, eye sɛ yɛkamfo wo wɔ Sion, na yedi bɔ a yɛhyɛɛ wo no so

2.verse: efisɛ, wutie mpaebɔ. Nnipa a wɔwɔ mmaa nyinaa bɛba wo nkyɛn

3.verse: wɔ wɔn bɔne ho. Yɛn bɔne di yɛn so nkonim, nanso wode kyɛ yɛn.

4.verse: Nhyira nka wɔn a wuyi wɔn ma wɔbɛtena wo Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ. Nneɛma pa a ɛwɔ wo fi hɔ no bɛsɔ yɛn ani, nhyira a ɛwɔ wo fi kronkron hɔ no.

5.verse: Wonam nkonim a woma yedi so bua yɛn, na woyɛ w’anwonwade de gye yɛn nkwa. Nnipa a wɔwɔ wiase mmaa nyinaa ne wɔn a wɔwɔ ɛpo so akyirikyiri nyinaa de wɔn ho to wo so.

6.verse: Wonam w’ahoɔden so hyehyɛɛ mmepɔw de kyerɛɛ wo tumi kɛse.

7.verse: Wudwo ɛpo nworoso ne asorɔkye nne. Wudwo nnipa mmobom nso.

8.verse: Wiase nyinaa ho dwiriw no wɔ anwonwade a woayɛ no ho. Nneɛma a woayɛ de ahosɛpɛw fi asase ano kɔ asase ano.

9.verse: Woma osu tɔ gu asase so de kyerɛ wo hwɛ. Woma enya srade na ɛdɔ. Wohyɛ nsuwa nsu ma ma. Woma asase nnɔbae. Sɛnea woyɛ no ni.

10.verse: Wotɔ osu bebree gu asase a wɔafuntum so ma nsu no fɔw no fɔkyee. Wopete nsu gu asase so ma ɛyɛ mmerɛw na ama afifide nkumaa anyin.

11.verse: Nnɔbae a w’adɔe ma no dɔɔso! Baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, pii wɔ hɔ.

12.verse: Wura no mu nso, nguan wɔ hɔ. Anigye wɔ koko no nkyɛn hɔ.

13.verse: Wura no mu yɛ nguan nko. Awi nso ayɛ ɔbon no mu ma tɔ. Biribiara teɛm, to ahosɛpɛw dwom.

1.verse: Ayeyi ne aseda dwom - Nnipa nyinaa, momfa ahosɛpɛw nto ayeyi dwom mma Onyankopɔn!

2.verse: Monto, nkamfo ne din. Monkamfo n’anuonyam!

3.verse: Munse Onyankopɔn se, “Wo nsa ano nnwuma yɛ nwonwa. Wo tumi so kosi sɛ w’atamfo de suro kotow w’anim.

4.verse: Obiara a ɔwɔ asase so kotow wo. Wɔto dwom de kamfo wo; wɔto dwom de kamfo wo din.

5.verse: Mommra mmɛhwɛ nea Onyankopɔn ayɛ; anwonwade a wayɛ wɔ nnipa mu.

6.verse: Ɔmaa ɛpo yɛɛ asase kesee; yɛn nenanom de wɔn nan twaa asu no. Ɛhɔ na nea ɔyɛe no nti, yɛn ani gyei.

7.verse: Ne tumi nti, odi hene daa daa, na ɔde n’ani nso hwɛ aman so. Mma dɔm nnsɔre nntia no.

8.verse: Aman nyinaa, monkamfo yɛn Nyankopɔn; momma wɔnte mo nkamfo no.

9.verse: Wama yɛte nkwa mu na ɔmma ho kwan mma yɛnhwe ase.

10.verse: Onyankopɔn, woasɔ yɛn ahwɛ. Sɛnea ogya hoa dwetɛ ho no, saa ara na woasɔ yɛn ahwɛ.

11.verse: Womaa firi yii yɛn na wode nnosoa a ɛyɛ duru guu yɛn akyi.

12.verse: Womaa yɛn atamfo twiw faa yɛn so. Yɛfaa ogya ne nsuyiri mu, nanso mprempren wode yɛn abedu baabi a asomdwoe wɔ.

13.verse: Mede ɔhyew afɔre bɛba wo fi; mede nea mehyɛɛ wo ho bɔ no bɛma wo.

14.verse: Mede nea mekae se mede bɛma wo bere a na mewɔ ɔhaw mu no, bɛma wo.

15.verse: Mɛma oguan, na wɔahyew no afɔremuka no so. Mede anantwinini ne mmirekyi bɛbɔ afɔre no, na wusiw no akɔ soro tee.

16.verse: Mo a mohyɛ Onyankopɔn anuonyam nyinaa mommra mmetie, na mɛka nea wayɛ ama me akyerɛ mo.

17.verse: Misu frɛɛ no sɛ ɔmmoa me; metoo nnwom kamfoo no.

18.verse: Sɛ midii me bɔne akyi a, anka Awurade rentie me.

19.verse: Nanso, nokwarem, Onyankopɔn atie me, watie me mpaebɔ.

20.verse: Mekamfo Onyankopɔn efisɛ, wampo me mpaebɔ na wannyae ne dɔ a ɔde dɔ me daa no.

1.verse: Aseda dwom - Onyankopɔn, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ na hyira yɛn. Fa w’adɔe hwɛ yɛn,

2.verse: na ama wiase nyinaa ahu wo pɛ; na ama aman nyinaa ahu wo pɛ; na ama aman nyinaa ahu wo nkwagye.

3.verse: Ma adasamma nkamfo wo, O Onyankopɔn; ma nnipa nyinaa nkamfo wo!

4.verse: Ma aman ani nnye na wɔnto ahosɛpɛw nnwom efisɛ, wubuu nnipa atɛntrenee na wokyerɛɛ aman a ɛwɔ asase so kwan.

5.verse: Ma adasamma nkamfo wo, O, Onyankopɔn; ma nnipa nyinaa nkamfo wo!

6.verse: Asase no abɔ n’aduan; Onyankopɔn, yɛn Nyankopɔn ahyira yɛn.

7.verse: Onyankopɔn ahyira yɛn. Nnipa a wɔwɔ mmaa nyinaa nhyɛ no anuonyam.

1.verse: Ɔman nkonim dwom - Onyankopɔn ma ne ho so bɔ n’atamfo pete. Wɔn a wɔtan no guan wɔ nkogu mu.

2.verse: Sɛnea wɔbɔ wusiw gu no, saa ara na ɔpam wɔn. Sɛnea srade nan wɔ ogya so no, saa ara na amumɔyɛfo yera wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.

3.verse: Nanso atreneefo ani gye na wɔn ho sɛpɛw wɔn wɔ n’anim. Wɔwɔ ahotɔ na wɔteɛm ahosɛpɛw so.

4.verse: To dwom ma Onyankopɔn; to dwom kamfo ne din. Siesie ɔkwan ma nea ɔnam omununkum mu no. Ne din de Awurade; ma w’ani nnye wɔ n’anim.

5.verse: Onyankopɔn a ɔte ne fi kronkron mu no hwɛ nnyanka ne akunafo.

6.verse: Ɔma onnibie ofi tena mu na wayi nneduafo ama wɔade wɔn ho ahotɔ mu. Nanso wɔn a wotia Onyankopɔn no bɛtena asase so akyirikyiri.

7.verse: O Onyankopɔn, bere a wudii wo nkurɔfo anim, bere a wode wɔn faa sare so no,

8.verse: asase wosowee na osu tɔe esiane Sinai Nyankopɔn ne Israel Nyankopɔn no ba nti.

9.verse: Womaa osu tɔe bebree maa w’asasenini no yɛɛ yie.

10.verse: Wo nkurɔfo kyekyeree wɔn afi wɔ hɔ; wɔnam w’adɔe so hwɛɛ ahiafo.

11.verse: Awurade hyɛɛ mmara maa mmea kɔkae se,

12.verse: “Ahemfo ne wɔn asraafo reguan!” Mmea a wɔwɔ fie no kyɛɛ asade no mu fae:

13.verse: mmuruburu a wɔde dwetɛ afa wɔn ho a wɔanan sikakɔkɔɔ a ɛhyerɛn agu wɔn ntaban so. Adɛn nti na mo mu bi tenaa nguandan mu ɔko da no?

14.verse: Bere a Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn bɔɔ ahene a wɔwɔ Salmon Bepɔw so hwetee no, ɔmaa sukyerɛmma tɔe wɔ hɔ.

15.verse: Basan bepɔw yɛ kɛse a ɛwɔ nkoko bebree.

16.verse: Adɛn nti na mo nkoko, mode ani bɔne hwɛ bepɔw a Onyankopɔn ayi sɛ ɔbɛtena so? Awurade bɛtena hɔ daa daa.

17.verse: Awurade bɛtena ne nteaseɛnam akɛse mpempem no mu afi Sinai akɔ kurow kronkron no mu.

18.verse: Ɔde nneduafo bebree ka ne ho kɔ atifi pɛɛ, na wogye akyɛde fi wɔn a wɔayɛ no dɔm no nkyɛn. Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛtena hɔ.

19.verse: Kamfo Awurade, nea ɔsoa yɛn nnosoa da biara no. Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn a ogye yɛn nkwa.

20.verse: Yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ Onyankopɔn a ogye nkwa. Ɔyɛ Awurade, yɛn Awurade a ogye yɛn fi owu mu.

21.verse: Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ ɔbɛpɛtɛw n’atamfo ne wɔn a bɔne ara na wɔkɔ so yɛ no ti.

22.verse: Awurade aka se, “Mede mo atamfo befi Basan asan aba; mɛsan ayi wɔn afi po bunu mu,

23.verse: na moanantew wɔn mogya mu na akraman ataforo dodow biara a wɔpɛ.”

24.verse: O Onyankopɔn, obiara ahu wo nkonimdi santen a woreto no; Onyankopɔn, me hene, santen a ɔreto akɔ ne Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ no.

25.verse: Nnwontofo no wɔ anim, ɛnna nnwomkyerɛfo no nso wɔ akyiri, na wɔn ntam na mmeawa a wɔrebɔ akyene no wɔ.

26.verse: “Kamfo Onyankopɔn wɔ hyia a ɔne ne nkurɔfo ahyia no. Mo, Yakob asefo nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade!”

27.verse: Odikanfo a ɔba no ne Benyamin, abusua ketewaa koraa no; nea odi hɔ ne Yuda ne ne nkurɔfo, na Sebulon ne Naftali adikanfo aba.

28.verse: O Onyankopɔn, kyerɛ wo tumi, tumi a wode adi ama yɛn no,

29.verse: tumi a efi wo fi a ɛwɔ Yerusalem a ahene bɛkyɛ wo nneɛma wɔ mu no.

30.verse: Ka Misraim ne mu mmoa a wɔhyɛ demmire mu ne aman ne emu anantwinini ne wɔn tɔte anim kosi sɛ wɔbɛkotow wo de wɔn dwetɛ ama wo. Bɔ wɔn a wɔn ani gye ɔko ho no pete.

31.verse: Ananmusifo befi Misraim aba, na Sudanfo ama wɔn nsa so abɔ mpae afrɛ Onyankopɔn.

32.verse: Wiase ahemman, monto dwom mma Onyankopɔn. Monto ayeyi dwom mma Awurade

33.verse: a ɔnam wim, tete wim no. Muntie no, na mompɔ so dennen.

34.verse: Monna Onyankopɔn tumi adi. Ne kɛseyɛ wɔ Israel na ne tumi wɔ wim.

35.verse: Onyankopɔn ho yɛ hu wɔ ne tenabea kronkron mu hɔ; Israel Nyankopɔn! Ɔma ne nkurɔfo ahoɔden ne tumi. Kamfo Onyankopɔn.

1.verse: Osufrɛ - Gye me nkwa, O Onyankopɔn! Nsu no deda me kɔn mu.

2.verse: Meremem wɔ atɛkyɛ mu, na asase a ɛso wo nni baabi. Madu subunu mu na asorɔkye no pɛ sɛ ɛfa me.

3.verse: Mafrɛ mabrɛ. Me menem ayow. M’ani yɛ me yaw efisɛ, magyen no ara repɛ wo mmoa.

4.verse: Wɔn a wɔtan me kwa no dɔɔso sen me tiri so nhwi. M’atamfo twa atoro to me so; wɔyɛ den na wɔrepɛ akum me. Wɔma medan nneɛma a manwia mema.

5.verse: O Onyankopɔn, me bɔne so nkata wɔ w’anim. Wunim kwasea a mayɛ.

6.verse: Mma mennsoa aniwu mmmrɛ wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so. Otumfoɔ Awurade no so! Mma memmfa aniwu mmɛto wɔn a wɔsom wo so, O lsrael Nyankopɔn!

7.verse: Wo nti na wɔkasa tia me, nti aniwu akata me so.

8.verse: Mete sɛ ɔhɔho wɔ me nuanom mu. Mete sɛ ɔmanfrani wɔ m’abusua mu.

9.verse: Me ho a mede ama wo fi no hyehye me mu te sɛ ogya. Kasatia a wɔkasa tia wo no ka me.

10.verse: Menam akɔnkyen so brɛ me ho ase, na nnipa kasa tia me.

11.verse: Mifura ayiasetam, na wɔserew me.

12.verse: Wɔka me ho nsɛm wɔ mmorɔn so; akɔwensafo de me too nnwom.

13.verse: Nanso me de, mɛbɔ wo mpae, Awurade; gye me so, Onyankopɔn, wɔ bere a wopɛ mu. Wo dɔ kɛse nti, gye me so efisɛ, woahyɛ bɔ sɛ wubegye me nkwa.

14.verse: Mma memmmem wɔ atɛkyɛ mu. Gye me fi m’atamfo nsam, na gye me fi nsu a emu dɔ mu.

15.verse: Mma nsu nnyiri mmfa me. Mma memmmem wɔ bunu anaa damoa mu.

16.verse: Gye me so, Awurade, wɔ wo dɔ pa a wode dɔ me daa no mu. W’ahummɔbɔ mu, dan w’ani hwɛ me!

17.verse: Mfa wo ho nhintaw wo somfo; mewɔ ɔhaw mu na gye me so mprempren!

18.verse: Bra me nkyɛn na begye me. Gye me fi m’atamfo nsam.

19.verse: Wunim sɛnea wɔkasa tia me ne sɛnea wogu m’anim ase sɛe m’anuonyam. Wuhu m’atamfo nyinaa.

20.verse: Kasatia hyɛ me koma so ama m’anidaso asa. Na minim sɛ obi bɛma me due, nanso mannya obi. Mepɛɛ awerɛkyekye nanso mannya bi.

21.verse: Ɔkɔm dee me no, wɔmaa me awuduru. Osukɔm dee me no, wɔmaa me nsanyinyanyinya.

22.verse: Wɔn apontow mfa wɔn nkɔ ɔsɛe mu. Ma wɔn adidi a wɔatew ho no mmɔ wɔn fam.

23.verse: Ma wɔn ani mfurafura. Na ma wɔn akyi nyɛ mmerɛw.

24.verse: Fa w’abufuw kɔ wɔn so, na ma w’abufuw mmene wɔn.

25.verse: Ma wɔn atenae nyɛ amamfo. Mma obiara ntena nkwa mu wɔ wɔn ntamadan mu.

26.verse: Wɔtaa wɔn a woatwe wɔn aso. Wɔka wɔn a woapira wɔn no amanehunu ho asɛm.

27.verse: Kyerɛw wɔn bɔne a wɔayɛ gu hɔ. Mma wɔnnkɔka wo nkwagyedwuma no ho.

28.verse: Popa wɔn din fi ateasefo nhoma no mu. Mfa wɔn din nka wo nkurɔfo de ho.

29.verse: Nanso mewɔ yaw mu, na m’anidaso asa. Ma me so, O Onyankopɔn, na gye me nkwa!

30.verse: Mɛto dwom akamfo Onyankopɔn; mɛda no ase de ada ne kɛseyɛ adi.

31.verse: Eyi bɛsɔ Awurade ani yiye sen nantwi afɔrebɔ; ɛsen nantwinini a wanyin afɔrebɔ.

32.verse: Sɛ mmɔborɔni hu eyi a, n’ani begye. Na wɔn a wɔsom Onyankopɔn benya nkuranhyɛ.

33.verse: Awurade tie wɔn a ade ahia wɔn, na ne werɛ mfi ne nkurɔfo a wɔyɛ nneduafo.

34.verse: Monkamfo Onyankopɔn, O ɔsoro ne asase, ɛpo ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa.

35.verse: Obegye Yerusalem, na wasan akyekye Yuda nkurow. Ne nkurɔfo bɛtena hɔ na wɔafa asase no.

36.verse: N’asomfo asefo na wɔbɛfa hɔ, na wɔn a wɔpɛ n’asɛm no atena hɔ.

1.verse: Mmoa mpae - Gye me nkwa, O Onyankopɔn! Awurade, boa me mprempren!

2.verse: Ma wonni wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wokum me no so na ma wɔn adwene nyɛ basabasa. Ma wɔn a esiane me haw nti wɔatɔ wɔn no, nsan wɔn akyi na wongu wɔn anim ase.

3.verse: Ma wɔn a wodi me ho fɛw no mfa wɔn nkogu so mma wɔn koma ntu.

4.verse: Ma wɔn a wɔba wo nkyɛn no ani nnye na wɔn ho nsɛpɛw wɔn. Ma wɔn a wɔda wo nkwagye no so ase no nka daa se, “Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔkɛse!”

5.verse: Mayɛ mmerɛw na minni ɔboafo; bra me nkyɛn ntɛm, O Onyankopɔn. Wone m’agyenkwa, O Awurade; yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.

1.verse: Akwakoraa mpaebɔ - Awurade, maba wo nkyɛn sɛ ma me guankɔbea. Mma wonnni me so da!

2.verse: Esiane sɛ woyɛ ɔtreneeni nti, boa me na gye me. Tie me na gye me nkwa!

3.verse: Fa me sie wɔ wo nwini ase ne w’abankɛse mu, fa bɔ me ho ban; wone me guankɔbea ne me hwɛfo.

4.verse: Me Nyankopɔn gye me fi amumɔyɛfo ne atirimɔdenfo tumi ne nnebɔneyɛfo nsam.

5.verse: Awurade, m’ani da wo so. Mede me ho too wo so bere a na misua.

6.verse: Me nkwa nna nyinaa, mede me ho ato wo so. Efi bere a wɔwoo me, woabɔ me ho ban. Mɛkamfo wo daa.

7.verse: M’abrabɔ ayɛ nhwɛso ama nnipa pii efisɛ, woyɛ me gyefo a woyɛ den.

8.verse: Fi anɔpa kosi anwummere, mekamfo na meda w’anuonyam adi.

9.verse: Afei a magow yi, mpa me. Afei a mayɛ mmerɛw yi, mpa me.

10.verse: M’atamfo pɛ sɛ wokum me. Wɔkasa kɔ me tiri so apam.

11.verse: Wɔka se, “Onyankopɔn agyaw no hɔ; momma yenni n’akyi nkɔkyere no na obiara nni hɔ a obegye no.”

12.verse: Ntew wo ho ntena akyiri, O Onyankopɔn; me Nyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm begye me.

13.verse: Ma wɔn a wɔtaa me no nni nkogu na wɔnsɛe wɔn. Ma wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wopira me ani nwu na wɔn anim ngu ase.

14.verse: Daa mede m’ani bɛto wo so; mɛkɔ so akamfo wo daa daa.

15.verse: Mɛka w’ayamye akyerɛ. Fi anɔpa kosi anwummere nyinaa mɛka wo nkwagye ho asɛm; emu yɛ duru sen me ntease.

16.verse: Mɛkamfo wo tumi, Otumfoɔ Awurade. Mɛpae mu aka w’adɔe ho asɛm; wo nkutoo de.

17.verse: Woakyerɛ me fi me mmofraase na mekɔ so ka w’anwonwasɛm ho asɛm.

18.verse: Afei a mabɔ akwakoraa na me ti so afuw dwen yi, nnyaw me, O Onyankopɔn! Ka me ho bere a mepae mu ka wo tumi ne wo kɛseyɛ ho asɛm kyerɛ nkyirimma nyinaa no.

19.verse: Wo treneeyɛ, Onyankopɔn, du wim. Woayɛ nneɛma akɛse; obi nte sɛ wo.

20.verse: Woama ɔhaw ne amanehunu aba me so de, nanso wobɛma manya ahoɔden bio; wobɛtwe me afi damoa ho.

21.verse: Wobɛyɛ me kɛse asen daa. Wobɛkyekye me werɛ bio.

22.verse: Mede sanku bɛkamfo wo. Me Nyankopɔn, mɛkamfo wo nokware. Me sanku so mɛbɔ nnwom ama wo, Israel ɔkronkronni.

23.verse: Migu so rebɔ no, mɛteɛm anigye so. Mede me nipadua nyinaa bɛto dwom efisɛ, woagye me nkwa.

24.verse: Fi anɔpa kosi anwummere nyinaa mɛka wo treneeyɛ ho asɛm akyerɛ efisɛ, wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhaw me no, woadi wɔn so nkonim ama wɔn anim agu ase.

1.verse: Mpae a wɔbɔ ma ɔhene - Kyerɛ ɔhene no na ommu w’atɛntrenee, O Onyankopɔn. Kyɛ no atemmu nyansa no bi

2.verse: sɛnea ɔde nokware bedi wo nkurɔfo so na wahwɛ wɔn a wɔremia wɔn no trenee mu.

3.verse: Asase no nkɔ so frɔmfrɔm. Ma trenee mmra asase no so.

4.verse: Ma ɔhene mmu ahiafo atɛn pa. Ma ɔmmoa ahiafo na onni wɔn a womia wɔn afɛfo so nkonim.

5.verse: Wo nkurɔfo nsom wo mmere dodow a owia bɔ yi, na ɔsram nso hyerɛn kɔsi daa daa yi.

6.verse: Ma ɔhene no nyɛ sɛ osu a ɛtɔ wɔ afum, ɛnyɛ sɛ obosu a egugu asase no so.

7.verse: Ma trenee mmu so ne nkwa nna mu, na nkɔso mmɔ atenaseɛ mmere dodow a ɔsram kɔ so haran yi.

8.verse: N’ahenni befi po akosi po na afi Efrata akosi asase ano.

9.verse: Nnipa a wɔwɔ sare no so bɛkotow n’anim. N’atamfo bɛtow wɔn ho agu fam.

10.verse: Sampanya ahene ne ɛhɔ supɔw no sofo bɛma no akyɛde. Arabia ahene ne Etiopia ahene bɛkyɛ no akyɛde.

11.verse: Ahene nyinaa bɛkotow n’anim; aman nyinaa bɛsom no.

12.verse: Ahiafo a wɔfrɛ no no, ogye wɔn ne mmɔborɔfo ne wɔn a wonni ahwɛfo nyinaa.

13.verse: Ohu wɔn a wɔayɛ mmerɛw ne ahiafo mmɔbɔ. Ogye wɔn a ade ahia wɔn no nkwa.

14.verse: Ogye wɔn fi ɔhyɛ ne basabasayɛ mu. Wɔn nkwa som no bo.

15.verse: Ɔhene nkwa so! Wɔmfa sikakɔkɔɔ mfi Arabia mmrɛ no. Wɔmmɔ mpae mma no bere biara. Onyankopɔn nhyira nka no daa daa.

16.verse: Aburow mmu so wɔ asase no so. Afuduan mmu so wɔ nkoko so, na aba mmra bebree sɛ Lebanon. Nnipa nhyɛ nkurow so ma te sɛ sare so sare.

17.verse: Daa, wɔnkae ɔhene din na ne din ntena nkyɛ sɛ owia. Aman nyinaa nkamfo no. Wɔnsrɛ Onyankopɔn na onhyira wɔn na wɔnsrɛ ahotɔ mma ɔhene.

18.verse: Monkamfo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn! Ɔno nko ara na ɔyɛ saa anwonwade yi.

19.verse: Monkamfo ne din a anuonyam ahyɛ no ma no daa daa. N’anuonyam nhyɛ wiase nyinaa ma, Amen! Amen!

20.verse: Yisai ba Dawid mpaebɔ no awiei ni.

1.verse: NKYƐM A ƐTO SO ABIƐSA NNWOM 73-89 Onyankopɔn atɛntrenee - Onyankopɔn ye ma Israel ne wɔn a wɔn koma mu tew ampa ara.

2.verse: Nanso anka mereyɛ apa abaw; me gyidi sae koraa,

3.verse: efisɛ, sɛ mihu sɛ nneɛma rekɔ yiye ma ahantanfo ne amumɔyɛfo a, na m’ani abere.

4.verse: Wonhu honam mu yaw; wosi pi si ta.

5.verse: Wonhu amane sɛnea afoforo hu no. Ɔhaw nto wɔn sɛnea ɛto afoforo no.

6.verse: Enti wɔhyɛ ahantan sɛ konmude, ne basabasa sɛ atade.

7.verse: Wɔn koma hwie bɔne gu, na amumɔyɛ adwene ahyɛ wɔn adwene ma.

8.verse: Wɔserew afoforo na wɔka wɔn ho nsɛm a enye. Wɔyɛ ahantan na wodwen ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so ahyɛ wɔn so.

9.verse: Wɔka bɔne fa Onyankopɔn a ɔte soro ho, na wɔahyɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ asase so ahantan so.

10.verse: Ɛyɛ saa ma Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo dan kɔ wɔn afa, na wɔde ahopere gye wɔn nsɛm a wɔka biara di.

11.verse: Wɔka se, “Onyankopɔn renhu. Ɔsorosoroni no renhwehwɛ mu da.”

12.verse: Saa na amumɔyɛfo te. Wɔwɔ pii, na wonya pii ka ho.

13.verse: Tew a matew me ho kronn a menyɛɛ bɔne biara no ho nni mfaso anaa?

14.verse: O Onyankopɔn, woama mahu amane fi anɔpa kosi anwummere. Anɔpa biara wotwe m’aso.

15.verse: Sɛ meka saa asɛm no bi a, anka merenyɛ sɛ wo nnipa no mu baako.

16.verse: Midwen saa ɔhaw yi ho, nanso na ɛboro me so

17.verse: kosii sɛ mekɔɔ wofi hɔ. Ɛhɔ na metee nea ɛbɛba amumɔyɛfo no so.

18.verse: Wode wɔn begu baabi a ɛhɔ yɛ toro, na woama wɔahwe ase akɔ ɔsɛe mu!

19.verse: Wɔsɛe wɔn prɛkopɛ na wɔn awiei ayɛ pasaa.

20.verse: Wɔte sɛ ɔdae a etwam anɔpa; sɛ wosɔre a, O Awurade, wɔyera.

21.verse: Bere a na m’adwene yɛ bɔne na me nkatede yɛ opira no,

22.verse: na magyimi sɛ aboa; mante wo ase.

23.verse: Nanso, na mete bɛn wo pɛɛ na wode wo nsa soo me mu.

24.verse: Wonam w’akwankyerɛ so kyerɛɛ me kwan na ewiee akyiri no, woagye me anuonyam so.

25.verse: Ɛdɛn na mewɔ wɔ soro ka wo ho? Manya wo yi, dɛn bio na mehwehwɛ wɔ asase so?

26.verse: M’adwene ne me nipadua begugow nanso, Onyankopɔn ne m’ahoɔden. Ɔno na ne ho hia me daa.

27.verse: Wɔn a wogyae wo no bɛyera. Wobɛsɛe wɔn a wonni no nokware.

28.verse: Nanso me de, minim sɛ wobɛn Onyankopɔn na wopɛ ogye wɔ Otumfoɔ Awurade no nkyɛn na wopae mu ka nea wayɛ nyinaa a, ɛyɛ anwonwasɛm.

1.verse: Ɔmannyina mpaebɔ - O Onyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woagyaa yɛn mu saa? Wo bo befuw wo nkurɔfo akosi wiase awiei?

2.verse: Kae wo nkurɔfo a wo ara wuyii wɔn mmere pii a atwam de wɔn fi nkoasom mu bɛyɛɛ w’ankasa w’abusua no. Kae Sion bepɔw a da bi hɔ na wote so no.

3.verse: Nantew fa saa amamfo yi so; yɛn atamfo na wɔasɛe biribiara a ɛwɔ asɔrefi hɔ.

4.verse: W’atamfo teɛm nkonim so wɔ wo fi hɔ. Wɔasisi wɔn mfrankaa a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔadi nkonim.

5.verse: Wɔte sɛ nnipa nnuabufo a wɔde wɔn mmonnua bu nnua gu.

6.verse: Wɔde wɔn mmonnua ne wɔn nname sɛee mpongua no nyinaa.

7.verse: Wobubuu wo fi no, na wɔtoo mu gya. Woguu faako a wɔsom wo hɔ no ho fi.

8.verse: Wɔpɛe sɛ anka wɔtɔre yɛn ase; wɔhyew mmeae kronkron a ɛwɔ asase no so nyinaa.

9.verse: Yɛn agyiraehyɛde kronkron no nyinaa kɔ. Adiyifo nyinaa asa na obiara nnim nna ko a eyi bedi.

10.verse: O Onyankopɔn, w’atamfo bɛserew wo akosi da bɛn? Wɔbɛkasa atia wo din akosi daa daa?

11.verse: Adɛn nti na wompɛ sɛ woboa yɛn? Adɛn na woabobɔw wo nsa agu w’akyi?

12.verse: Nanso woyɛ yɛn hene fi mfitiase, O Onyankopɔn. Woagye yɛn nkwa mpɛn pii.

13.verse: Wonam w’ahoɔden tumi so kyɛɛ po mu abien, na wopɛtɛw nsu mu atweaseɛ ti.

14.verse: Wopɛtɛw bonsu ti na wode ne nam maa sare so mmoa wee.

15.verse: Womaa nsuwa ne nsuti teɛe na womaa nsu akɛse yoyoe.

16.verse: Wobɔɔ awia ne anadwo. Wode owia ne ɔsram sii wɔn tenabea.

17.verse: Wokyerɛɛ nea ɛsɛ sɛ asase ano kɔpem. Wobɔɔ ahohuru ne awɔw.

18.verse: Nanso kae, O Awurade, sɛ w’atamfo serew wo sɛ woyɛ kronn nam so bu wo animtia.

19.verse: Nyaw wo nkurɔfo a wonni boafo no mma wɔn atamfo atirimɔdenfo no. Mma wo werɛ mmfi nnipa a wɔtaa wo no!

20.verse: Kae apam a wo ne yɛn hyehyɛe no. Basabasayɛ wɔ asase no tweaa so sum mu baabiara.

21.verse: Ma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no anim ngu ase. Ma ahiafo ne mmɔborɔfo nkamfo wo.

22.verse: Ma wo ho so, Onyankopɔn, na yi wo ho adi! Kae sɛ nnebɔneyɛfo serew wo daa nyinaa.

23.verse: Mma wo werɛ mmfi abufuw nteɛteɛm ne gyegyeegye a w’atamfo yɛ no.

1.verse: Ɔtemmufo Nyankopɔn - Yɛda wo ase, O Onyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase! Yɛda wo kɛseyɛ adi ka anwonwade a woayɛ.

2.verse: Onyankopɔn ka se, “Mahyɛ bere a mede bebu atɛn na mebu atɛntrenee.

3.verse: Ɛwom, abɔde biara ho popo na asase ankasa wosow nanso mɛma ne fapem ayɛ den.

4.verse: “Meka kyerɛ amumɔyɛfo se, wɔnnyɛ ahantan.

5.verse: Meka kyerɛ wɔn se wonnyae wɔn ahohoahoa no.”

6.verse: Atemmu no remfi apuei anaa atɔe anaa atifi anaaa anafo.

7.verse: Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufo no. Obebu ebinom fɔ na wagyaa ebinom nso.

8.verse: Awurade kita kuruwa a n’abufuw nsa a ano yɛ den wɔ mu wɔ ne nsam. Ohwie gu ma amumɔyɛfo nyinaa nom. Wnom ne nyinaa a sɔpɛ koraa nka.

9.verse: Nanso merennyae Yakob Nyankopɔn ho asɛnka da, na merennyae ayeyi dwom a meto ma no no nso da.

10.verse: Obebubu amumɔyɛfo tumi mu, nanso ɔtreneeni tumi mu bɛhyɛ den.

1.verse: Nkonimdifo Nyankopɔn - Wonim Onyankopɔn wɔ Yuda. Wɔhyɛ ne din anuonyam wɔ Israel.

2.verse: Ɔwɔ ofi wɔ Yerusalem; ɔte Sion Bepɔw so.

3.verse: Ɛhɔ na obubuu atamfo agyan, wɔn kyɛm, wɔn nkrante ne wɔn akode nyinaa.

4.verse: O Onyankopɔn, w’anuonyam so! Wufi mmepɔw no a wudii w’atamfo so no so reba wo tumi so.

5.verse: Woagye wɔn asraafo akokoduru no ho nneɛma nyinaa ama wɔada awufo nna. Wɔn ahoɔden ne wɔn nyansa nyinaa yɛɛ kwa.

6.verse: Wobɔɔ wɔn hu no, O Yakob Nyankopɔn, apɔnkɔ no ne wɔn sotefo nyinaa wuwui.

7.verse: Na wo Awurade de, obiara suro wo. Sɛ wo bo fuw a, obi ntumi nnyina w’anim.

8.verse: Wubu atɛn fi soro; wiase suroe na ɛyɛɛ dinn,

9.verse: bere a wosɔre buu atɛn a wode gyee wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no no.

10.verse: Nnipa abufuw de ayeyi a ɛdɔɔso brɛɛ wo. Wɔn a wɔanwu ɔko no mu no, bɛhyɛ wo fa no nyinaa bi.

11.verse: Nea wode ahyɛ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn bɔ no, fa ma no. Aman a mobɛn nyinaa mommrɛ no akyɛde.

12.verse: Onyankopɔn ma nnipa suro no; ɔbrɛ ahenemma ahantanfo ase, na ɔbɔ ahene akɛse hu.

1.verse: Amane mu awerɛkyekyere - Misu dennen mefrɛ Onyankopɔn; misu dennen na otie me.

2.verse: Ɔhaw mu, mebɔ Awurade mpae; anadwo mu nyinaa, mema me nsa so bɔ mpae nanso me werɛ nkyekye.

3.verse: Sɛ midwen Onyankopɔn ho a, migu ahome; sɛ midwen komm a, mabasa mu bu.

4.verse: Ɔma me si pɛ anadwo nyinaa. Nsɛm haw me nti, mintumi nkasa.

5.verse: Midwen nna a atwam no na mekae nna a atwam dedaw no.

6.verse: Anadwo mu no nyinaa midwenee yiye. Midwenee komm no, asɛm a mibisaa me ho ni,

7.verse: “Enti daa Awurade bɛpo yɛn saa? Afei n’ani rensɔ yɛn bio?

8.verse: Wagyae dɔ a ɔdɔ yɛn no? Na ne bɔhyɛ no, wagyae?

9.verse: Onyankopɔn werɛ afi sɛ obehu mmɔbɔ? Abufuw abesi n’ahummɔbɔ ananmu anaa?”

10.verse: Afei mekae se, “Nea ɛhaw me titiriw koraa ne sɛ afei de, Onyankopɔn nni tumi bio.”

11.verse: Mɛkae nneɛma akɛse a woyɛe no, Awurade; mɛkae anwonwade a woyɛɛ no tete no.

12.verse: Medwen nea woayɛ no nyinaa ho. Medwen wo tumideyɛ no nyinaa ho komm.

13.verse: Biribiara a woyɛ no, O Onyankopɔn, yɛ kronn; onyame bi nso nsen wo.

14.verse: Woyɛ Onyankopɔn a woyɛ anwonwade; wokyerɛ wo tumi wɔ aman so.

15.verse: Wonam wo tumi so gye wo nkurɔfo a wɔyɛ Yakob ne Yosef asefo no nkwa.

16.verse: Bere a ɛpo huu wo no, esuroe, O Onyankopɔn, na ɛpo mu donkudonku no mpo wosowee.

17.verse: Omununkum tɔɔ nsu; aprannaa paapae fii soro na anyinam tetew fii mmeae nyinaa.

18.verse: W’aprannaa a ɛpaapaee no bobɔe na anyinam a ɛtetewee no maa wiase sɔɔ hann. Asase wosowee.

19.verse: Wonantewee asorɔkye no mu; wutwaa ɛpo a ɛmu dɔ no, nanso wɔanhu w’anammɔn.

20.verse: Wudii wo nkurɔfo anim sɛ oguanhwɛfo a, na Mose ne Aaron na na wɔka wɔn ho.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn ne ne nkurɔfo - Me nkurɔfo, muntie me nkyerɛkyerɛ na monyɛ aso mma asɛm a meka no.

2.verse: Mede abebu rebɛkyerɛ mo anwonwade a esii tete no mu;

3.verse: nneɛma a yɛate na yɛahu; nneɛma a yɛn agyanom kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ yɛn.

4.verse: Yɛremfa nkame yɛn mma; yɛbɛka Awurade tumideyɛ ne anwonwade a wayɛ akyerɛ nkyirimma.

5.verse: Ɔmaa Israelfo mmara na ɔde ahyɛde nso maa Yakob asefo. Ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn agyanom se wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn mma ne mmara no,

6.verse: sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nkyirimma besua na wɔn nso akyerɛkyerɛ wɔn mma.

7.verse: Ɛba saa a, wɔn nso de wɔn ho bɛto Onyankopɔn so, na ɛremma wɔn werɛ mfi nea wayɛ, na daa wobedi ne mmara no so.

8.verse: Wɔrenyɛ sɛ wɔn nenanom adɔnyɛfo ne asoɔdenfo a wɔn gyidi a na wɔwɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn mu no antim da, nanso wɔantena ase sɛ nokwafo amma no.

9.verse: Efraimfo a wokitakita nnyan ne ne ntadua no guanee ɔko da no.

10.verse: Wɔanni wɔne Onyankopɔn apam no so; wɔampɛ sɛ wodi ne mmara no so.

11.verse: Wɔn werɛ fii anwonwade a wohui sɛ wayɛ no.

12.verse: Bere a na wɔn nenanom rehwɛ Onyankopɔn no, na ɔno nso reyɛ anwonwade wɔ Soan a ɛwɔ Misraim no.

13.verse: Ɔkyɛɛ ɛpo mu na ɔde wɔn faa mu. Ɔmaa nsu no gyinae sɛ afasuw.

14.verse: Ɔnam omununkum mu dii wɔn anim awia ne anadwo, kanea gya mu.

15.verse: Ɔpaee ɔbotan mu wɔ bepɔw so, na onyaa nsu fii mu de maa wɔn.

16.verse: Ɔmaa asuwa bɛtɔɔ ɔbotan no mu maa nsu sen fii mu sɛ asuten.

17.verse: Nanso wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne tiaa Onyankopɔn na bepɔw no so, wɔsɔre tiaa ɔsorosoroni no.

18.verse: Wɔboapa bisaa aduan a wɔpɛ de sɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe.

19.verse: Wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn se, “Onyankopɔn betumi ama aduan wɔ sare so anaa?

20.verse: Ɛwom sɛ ɔbɔɔ ɔbotan mu maa nsu pii sen fii mu, na obetumi ama yɛn abodoo na wama ne nkurɔfo nam nso?”

21.verse: Enti Onyankopɔn tee no, ne bo fuwii, na ɔde ogya kɔɔ ne nkurɔkfo so, na n’abufuw a ɛwɔ wɔn so no mu yɛɛ den

22.verse: efisɛ, na wonni ne mu gyidi sɛ obetumi agye wɔn nkwa.

23.verse: Nanso ɔkasa kyerɛɛ soro; ɔhyɛ maa n’apon buei.

24.verse: Ɔtɔɔ mana ma wodii.

25.verse: Enti wodii abɔfo aduan, na Onyankopɔn maa wɔn nea ehia wɔn nyinaa.

26.verse: Bio, ɔmaa apuei mframa bɔe, na ne tumi mu, ɔhwanyanee anadwo mframa,

27.verse: na ɔmaa ne nkurɔfo nnomaa a wɔn dodow bɛyɛ sɛ mpoano anhwea.

28.verse: Wɔtetew guguu ntamadan no mu ne ho nyinaa.

29.verse: Enti nnipa we mee. Onyankopɔn maa wɔn nea wɔhwehwɛ.

30.verse: Nanso, wɔn ani ansɔ nea wɔhwehwɛ no nyinaa ho a na wogu so didi

31.verse: bere a Onyankopɔn ani beree wɔn so na okum mmarima ahoɔdenfo a na wodi mu wɔ Israel no.

32.verse: Eyinom nyinaa akyi, na bɔne ara na nnipa no reyɛ; n’anwonwade no nyinaa akyi, wɔamfa wɔn ho anto ne so.

33.verse: Enti otwaa wɔn nna so te sɛ ɔhome na wɔn nkwa yɛɛ sin prɛkopɛ.

34.verse: Bere biara a obekum wɔn mu bi no, nkae no dan ba ne nkyɛn; wɔbɛsesa abɔ no mpae dennen.

35.verse: Wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ wɔn hwɛfo, na Otumfoɔ no bɛboa wɔn.

36.verse: Nanso na wɔn nsɛm no nyinaa yɛ atoro. Nsɛm a wɔka no mu biara nyɛ nokware.

37.verse: Na wonni no nokware; na wonni wɔne n’apam no nokware.

38.verse: Nanso na Onyankopɔn wɔ ahummɔbɔ ma ne nkurɔfo. Ɔde wɔn bɔne kyɛɛ wɔn na wansɛe wɔn. Mpɛn pii ɔkoraa nabufuw so na wanna n’abufuw adi.

39.verse: Ɔkaee sɛ wɔyɛ adasamma te sɛ mframa a ɛbɔ na etwam no.

40.verse: Mpɛn ahe na wɔansɔre antia no wɔ sare so hɔ, na mpɛn ahe na wɔamma ne werɛ anhow!

41.verse: Wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe adekyee ne adesae nam so de yaw brɛɛ Israel Nyankopɔn Kronkron no.

42.verse: Wɔn werɛ fii ne tumi kɛse no ne da a ogyee wɔn fii wɔn atamfo nsam,

43.verse: wɔ Soan tawtaw so a ɛwɔ Misraim no.

44.verse: Ɔmaa nsu dan mogya a na Misraimfo nnya nsu nnom.

45.verse: Ɔmaa nwansena baa wɔn so bɛhaw wɔn na mpɔtorɔ nso bɛsɛee wɔn asase.

46.verse: Ɔmaa mmoadabi bedii wɔn mfuduan de sɛee wɔn mfuw.

47.verse: Ɔde asukɔtweaa bɛsɛee wɔn bobe na ɔde sukyerɛmma sɛee wɔn ankye nnua.

48.verse: Ɔde asukɔtweaa kum wɔn anantwi ɛnna ɔde anyinam kum wɔn nguan.

49.verse: Ɔnam n’abufuw a ano yɛ den a ɛbae te sɛ owu asomafo no maa ɔhaw kɛse baa wɔn so.

50.verse: Wamfa n’abufuw ansie, na wamfa wɔn nkwa nso ankyɛ wɔn. Mmom, ɔmaa ɔyaredɔm bekum wɔn.

52.verse: Afei odii ne nkurɔfo anim te sɛ oguanhwɛfo de wɔn faa sare no so.

53.verse: Odii wɔn anim dwoodwoo, enti na wonsuro. Nanso ɛpo asorɔkye bɛbɔ faa wɔn atamfo so.

54.verse: Ɔde wɔn baa n’asase kronkron no ne mmepɔw a ɔko dii so no so.

55.verse: Ɔpamoo nnipa a na wɔte hɔ no de hɔ maa ne nkurɔfo. Ɔkyekyɛɛ wɔn nsase no mu de maa Israel mmusuakuw no de wɔn afi maa ne nkurɔfo no.

56.verse: Nanso wɔsrɔre tiaa Onyankopɔn tumfoɔ sɔɔ no hwɛe. Wɔanni ne mmara so.

57.verse: Na mmom, wɔsɔre tiaa no na wɔanni nokware sɛ wɔn agyanom, wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn so a, ɛnyɛ ye te sɛ agyan a akyeakyea no.

58.verse: Wɔn abosonsom hyɛɛ no abufuw, na wɔn ahoni a na wɔsom no maa ne bo fuwii.

59.verse: Onyankopɔn hui no, ne bo fuwii enti ɔpoo ne nkurɔfo no koraa.

60.verse: Ogyaw ne ntamadan wɔ Silo, faako a na ɔte wɔ wɔn mu no.

61.verse: Ɔmaa yɛn atamfo faa Apam Adaka a ɛyɛ ne tumi ne n’anuonyam agyiraehyɛde no.

62.verse: Ne bo fuwii ɔno ara ne nkurɔfo enti ɔmaa wɔn ara wɔn atamfo kunkum wɔn.

63.verse: Wokum mmerante wɔ ɔsa mu, enti na mmabaa nnya kunu nware.

64.verse: Asɔfo wuwui basabasayɛ mu na wɔamma wɔn akunafo no kwan amma wɔansu.

65.verse: Akyiri yi, Awurade sɔree sɛnea ofi nna mu. Na ɔte sɛ ɔhoɔdenfo a nsa ahyɛ no den.

66.verse: Odii wɔn so nea edi kan ne nea etwa to hyɛɛ wɔn aniwu, pamoo wɔn.

67.verse: Nanso ɔpoo Yosef asefo. Efraim abusua nso, wamfa wɔn.

68.verse: Na mmom, oyii Yuda ne Sion Bepɔw a na ɔpɛ n’asɛm no.

69.verse: Ɛhɔ na osii ne fi te sɛ ne soro fi. Ɔyɛɛ no den te sɛ asase pɛ a etim hɔ daa.

70.verse: Oyii ne somfo Dawid a ɔfrɛɛ no fii nguan adidibea hɔ no;

71.verse: ɔno na ɔhwɛɛ ne nguan so na ɔyɛɛ no Israel hene ne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo so oguanhwɛfo.

72.verse: Dawid de ne koma ne ne nyansa nyinaa hwɛɛ wɔn.

1.verse: Ɔmannyina mpaebɔ - O Onyankopɔn, abosonsomfo akyɛ w’asase afa. Wɔagu wo fi kronkron no ho fi ama Yerusalem adan amamfo.

2.verse: Wogyaw wo nkurɔfo amu maa apete; wo nkoa amu, wogyaw maa wuram mmoa sɛ wɔnwe.

3.verse: Wohwiee wo nkurɔfo mogya gui sɛ nsu. Mogya hwie gui sɛ nsu wɔ Yerusalem na obi anka a obesie awufo no.

4.verse: Aman a atwa yɛn ho ahyia no kasa tia yɛn; wɔserew yɛn, di yɛn ho fɛw.

5.verse: Awurade, wo bo befuw yɛn akosi daa daa? W’abufuw bɛkɔ so adɛw sɛ ogya?

6.verse: Dan w’abufuw kyerɛ aman a wɔnsom wo no ne wɔn a wɔmmɔ wo mpae no so.

7.verse: Efisɛ, wɔn na wɔakum wo nkurɔfo. Wɔn na wɔama wo man adan amamfo.

8.verse: Mfa yɛn agyanom bɔne so asotwe ntwe yɛn. Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ mprempren. Yɛn anidaso nyinaa asa.

9.verse: Boa yɛn, O Awurade, na gye yɛn nkwa. Gye yɛn na fa yɛn bɔne kyɛ yɛn wɔ w’anuonyam no nti.

10.verse: Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ aman bisa yɛn se, “Mo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?” Ma yenhu sɛ woatwe aman a wohwiee w’asomfo mogya gui no aso.

11.verse: Tie pene a nneduafo pene. Fa wo tumi kɛse no so gye wɔn a wɔabu wɔn kumfɔ no.

12.verse: Awurade, tua aman a aka no so ka mpɛn ason wɔ kasatia a wɔakasa atia wo no so.

13.verse: Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo manfo a yɛyɛ wo nguan nso no, bɛda wo ase, akamfo wo daa nyinaa.

1.verse: Ɔman foforoyɛ mpaebɔ - Tie yɛn, O Israel guanhwɛfo; tie yɛn, wo nguan sohwɛfo panyin. Wo a wote w’ahengua a esi atakraboa ntaban so no,

2.verse: da wo ho adi kyerɛ Efraim, Benyamin ne Manase mmusuakuw no. Da w’ahoɔden adi; bra begye yɛn nkwa.

3.verse: Fa yɛn san bra, O Onyankopɔn! Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ na yebenya nkwa.

4.verse: Wo bo befuw wo nkurɔfo mpaebɔ akosi bere bɛn, Otumfoɔ Awurade Nyankopɔn?

5.verse: Woama yɛn awerɛhow sɛ yenni ne nusu kuruwa kɛse ma sɛ yɛnnom.

6.verse: Ma aman a atwa yɛn ho ahyia no nko yɛn asase no so; yɛn atamfo kasa tia yɛn.

7.verse: San fa yɛn bra, Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn! Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ na wobegye yɛn nkwa.

8.verse: Wode bobe fi Misraim bae. Wopamoo aman foforo bi fii hɔ na wuduaa wɔ wɔn asase so.

9.verse: Wusiesiee baabi sɛnea ebenyin. Ne ntini no kɔɔ asase mu na ɛtrɛtrɛw asase no so nyinaa.

10.verse: Ɛde ne nhwini kata nkoko so na n’abaa no kata sida nnua so.

11.verse: N’abaa dennanee koduu ɛpo so kɔe ara koduu asu Efrata so.

12.verse: Adɛn nti na wubuu ban a atwa ho ahyia no? Mprempren, obiara a ɔbɛfa hɔ no betumi awia n’aba no bi;

13.verse: na kɔkɔte tiatia so na wuram mmom awe.

14.verse: Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn, dan w’ani hwɛ yɛn. Hwɛ yɛn fi soro hɔ; bra na begye wo nkurɔfo nkwa!

15.verse: Begye bobe a wuduae na nkwa; saa bobe ketewa a woma enyin ahoɔden so no!

16.verse: Yɛn atamfo ato mu gya atwa akyene; fa w’abufuw hwɛ wɔn na sɛe wɔn.

17.verse: Hwɛ nnipa a woayi wɔn no so na bɔ wɔn ho ban; ɔman a wugyinaa no ahoɔden so no.

18.verse: Yɛrennan yɛn ho mfi wo ho bio. Ma yɛn nkwa na yɛbɛkamfo wo.

19.verse: Otumfoɔ Awurade Nyankopɔn, san fa yɛn bra. Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ na wobegye yɛn nkwa.

1.verse: Dapɔnna Dwom - To ahosɛpɛw dwom ma Awurade, yɛn hwɛfo. To ayeyi dwom ma Yakob Nyankopɔn.

2.verse: Mumfi nnwonto no ase na mommɔ mpintin. Mommɔ nnwom a ɔyɛ dɛ wɔ sanku ne bɛnta so.

3.verse: Monhyɛn torobɛnto mma afahyɛ no bere a ɔsram apue foforo na wanyin no.

4.verse: Eyi yɛ Israel mmara; ɛyɛ mmara a efi Yakob Nyankopɔn nkyɛn. Bere a okotuaa Misraim asase no na ɔhyɛɛ mmara no maa Israelfo.

5.verse: Metee nne bi a minnim na ɛka se,

6.verse: “Miyii nnosoa no fii mo akyi. Mema mosoɛɛ mo ntayaa no.

7.verse: Bere a mowɔ ɔhaw mu no, mofrɛɛ me, na migyee mo nkwa. Mifii me hintabea a ɛwɔ ahum mu no gyee mo so. Mesɔɔ mo hwɛe wɔ Meriba nsu ho.

8.verse: Me nkurɔfo, muntie me kɔkɔbɔ yi. Mepɛ sɛ Israel tie me.

9.verse: Ɛnsɛ sɛ mosom anyame foforo.

10.verse: Mene mo Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn a oyii mo fii Misraim asase so no. Mummue mo anom na mɛhyɛ mu ma.

11.verse: Nanso me nkurɔfo rentie me. Israel rentie me.

12.verse: Enti ma wɔmfa wɔn kɔnsenee akwan no so na wɔnyɛ nea wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ biara.

13.verse: “Mepɛ sɛ me nkurɔfo tie me. Mepɛ sɛ wodi m’asɛm so.

14.verse: Anka medi wɔn atamfo nyinaa so ntɛm.

15.verse: Wɔn a wɔtan me no de suro bɛkotow me osuro so; wɔn asotwe bɛtena hɔ daa daa.

16.verse: Nanso mɛma mo esiam a ɛyɛ fɛ adi na mama mo ɛwo a ano yɛ mmerɛw aka ho.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, Ɔhene Kɛse - Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔsoro agyinatufo panyin. Anyame betwa hyia a, ɔno na obu atɛn se,

2.verse: “Munnyae atɛnkyewbu; mummmu amumɔyɛfo atɛnkyew.

3.verse: Mommɔ ahiafo ne akunafo yiyedi ho ban. Mummmu mo ani nngu ahiafo ne wɔn a wonni aboafo so.

4.verse: Munnye wɔn mfi nnipa amumɔyɛfo tumi ase.

5.verse: Nim a munnim ne nkwasea a moyɛ! Moadan nnebɔneyɛfo ama atɛntrenee ayera wɔ wiase!

6.verse: Mekae se, “Moyɛ anyame; mo nyinaa yɛ Ɔsorosoroni no mma.

7.verse: Nanso mubewuwu sɛ nnipa; mo nkwa nna to betwa sɛ ɔhene ba biara.”

8.verse: Bra, O Onyankopɔn, na bedi wiase so; aman nyinaa yɛ wo dea.

1.verse: Mpae a Israel bɔ pɛ sɛ wodi wɔn atamfo so - O Onyankopɔn, ntena hɔ komm; nyɛ komm! Nyɛ komm! Hwɛ! W’atamfo reyɛ basabasa, na wɔn a wɔtan wo no reyɛ dɔm.

2.verse: Hwɛ! W’atamfo reyɛ basabasa, na wɔn a wɔmpɛ w’asɛm nso ayɛ dɔm.

3.verse: Wɔrepam esum ase atia wo nkurɔfo; wɔrepam atia wɔn a wobɔ wɔn ho ban.

4.verse: Wɔka se, “Bra na yɛnsɛe wɔn man sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn werɛ befi Israel kora kora.”

5.verse: Wɔpenee wɔn apam no so kaa wɔn ho bɔɔ mu tiaa wo.

6.verse: Edomfo, Ismaelfo, Moabfo, Hagarfo,

7.verse: Gebalfo ne Amonfo ne Amalekfo ne Filistifo ne Tirofo ne

8.verse: Asiriafo akɔka wɔn ho ama Amonfo ne Moabfo a wɔyɛ Lot asefo no dɔm no ayɛ den.

9.verse: Yɛ wɔn sɛnea woyɛɛ Midianfo ne Siserafo ne Yabinfo wɔ Kison subon mu hɔ no.

10.verse: Wudii wɔn so wɔ Endor maa wɔn amu porɔwee wɔ fam.

11.verse: Yɛ wɔn a wodi wɔn anim no sɛnea woyɛɛ Oreb ne Seeb no; di wɔn ahene so sɛnea woyɛɛ Sebah ne Salmuna

12.verse: a wɔkae se, “Yɛbɛfa asase a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn de no” no.

13.verse: Bɔ wɔn hwete sɛ mfutuma, O Onyankopɔn; sɛ ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ gu.

14.verse: Sɛnea ogya hyew kwae, sɛnea ogyaframa ma nkoko hyew no,

15.verse: saa ara na fa ahum taa wɔn na fa wo mframa a ano yɛ den no yi wɔn hu.

16.verse: Ma animguase nka wɔn, O Awurade, na ma wonhu wo tumi.

17.verse: Ma wonni wɔn so nkonim na wɔmmɔ hu daa daa; ma wonwu wɔ animguase pɔtɔɔ mu.

18.verse: Ma wonhu sɛ, wo nko ara ne Awurade Otumfoɔ wɔ asase so nyinaa.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn fi anigyina - Awurade Tumfoɔ, medɔ wo fi no dodo.

2.verse: Mepɛ sɛ meba hɔ. M’ani agyina sɛ meba Awurade fi. Mede me nipadua nyinaa to ahosɛpɛw dwom ma Onyankopɔn teasefo no.

3.verse: Mpatiperɛw anwene wɔn birebuw na nsonfena nso wɔ wɔn afi. Wɔde wɔn mma sie wɔ w’afɔremuka ho, Otumfoɔ Awurade, me hene ne me Nyankopɔn.

4.verse: Wɔn a wɔte wo fi hɔ no wɔ ahotɔ. Daa wɔto nnwom kamfo wo.

5.verse: Wɔn a wonya ahoɔden fi wo nkyɛn no wɔ ahotɔ, na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkɔfrɛ wo wɔ Sion Bepɔw so.

6.verse: Wɔfa ɔtare bon a ayow kesee no mu a ɛdan asuten, na anɔpabosu hyɛ no nsu ma ma.

7.verse: Wɔrekɔ no nyinaa na wɔn ho reyɛ den; wobehu Onyankopɔn mu anyame wɔ Sion.

8.verse: Tie me mpaebɔ, Awurade Nyankopɔn. Tie, O Yakob Nyankopɔn.

9.verse: Hyira yɛn hene, O Onyankopɔn; ɔhene a woayi no no.

10.verse: Da koro pɛ a wodi wɔ wo fi no ye sen sɛ wobedi no baabi foforo biara mpɛn apem. Megyina me Nyankopɔn fi pon ano sen sɛ mɛtena amumɔyɛfo fi mu.

11.verse: Awurade ne yɛn hwɛfo ne ɔhene onuonyamfo a ɔde adɔe ne anuonyam hyira yɛn. Ɔmpopo ne ti wɔ ade pa biara a ɔde ma atreneefo ho.

12.verse: Awurade Tumfoɔ, wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so wɔ ahotɔ pa ara mu.

1.verse: Ɔman yiyedi mpaebɔ - Awurade, woahu wo asase mmɔbɔ; woama Israel adi yiye bio.

2.verse: Wode wo nkurɔfo bɔne nyinaa akyɛ wɔn.

3.verse: Wugyaee w’abufuw a wode kɔɔ wɔn so no.

4.verse: Fa yɛn san bra, O Onyankopɔn, yɛn agyenkwa na gyae sɔ a w’ani nsɔ yɛn no!

5.verse: Wo bo befuw yɛn akosi daa nyinaa? W’abufuw to rentwa da?

6.verse: Hyɛ yɛn den bio, na yɛn, wo nkurɔfo, bɛkamfo wo.

7.verse: Dɔ yɛn daa, O Awurade, na gye yɛn nkwa, boa yɛn.

8.verse: Meretie nea Awurade Nyankopɔn reka. Ɔhyɛɛ yɛn a yɛyɛ ɔno ara ne nkurɔfo no bɔ se, sɛ yɛannan amfa akwammɔne so a,

9.verse: akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ wasiesie ne ho sɛ wɔn a wodi no ni no, obegye wɔn nkwa, na ne nkwagye no bɛtena yɛn asase no so.

10.verse: Ɔdɔ ne nokware behyia, na trenee ne asomdwoee ayɛ atuu.

11.verse: Onipa nokware befi asase so akɔ soro, na Onyankopɔn trenee fi soro aba asase so.

12.verse: Awurade bɛma yɛanya nkɔso, na yɛn asase anya nnɔbae bebree.

13.verse: Atreneefo bedi Awurade anim asiesie ne kwan ama no.

1.verse: Mmoa mpaebɔ - Tie me, Awurade, na gye me so efisɛ, minni ɔboafo na meyɛ mmerɛw.

2.verse: Gye me fi owu mu efisɛ, migye wo di. Gye me nkwa efisɛ, meyɛ ɔsomfo na mewɔ wo mu gyidi.

3.verse: Woyɛ me Nyankopɔn, enti hu me mmɔbɔ. Mebɔ wo mpae daa nyinaa.

4.verse: Ma wo somfo ani nnye, O Awurade, efisɛ me mpaebɔ kɔ wo nkyɛn.

5.verse: Woyɛ yɛn adɔe na wode yɛn bɔne kyɛ, na wɔn a wɔbɔ wo mpae no nso, woma wɔn ɔdɔ a ɛnsa da.

6.verse: Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ; tie me sufrɛ na boa me.

7.verse: Mefrɛ wo hiada mu efisɛ, wugye me mpaebɔ so.

8.verse: Onyame bi nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ wo, O Awurade, obiara ntumi nyɛɛ nea woayɛ.

9.verse: Aman a woakyekyere nyinaa bɛba abɛkotow wo; wɔbɛkamfo wo kɛseyɛ.

10.verse: Woyɛ otumfoɔ a woyɛ nneɛma akɛse. Wo nko ne Onyankopɔn.

11.verse: Awurade, kyerɛ me nea wopɛ sɛ meyɛ na medi so nkoware mu. Kyerɛ me na memfa m’adagyew nsom wo.

12.verse: Mede me koma nyinaa bɛkamfo wo, O Awurade me Nyankopɔn. Mɛda wo kɛseyɛ no adi daa daa.

13.verse: Dɔ a wodɔ me daa no so. Woagye me afi damoa ankasa mu.

14.verse: Ahantanfo reba abɛyɛ me dɔm, O Onyankopɔn; atirimɔdenfo kuw pɛ sɛ wokum me; wɔn a wommu wo no.

15.verse: Nanso wo, O Awurade, yɛ mmɔborɔhunufo ne ɔdɔ Nyankopɔn. Daa, wowɔ boasetɔ wɔ ayamye, na woyɛ ɔnokwafo nso.

16.verse: Dan w’ani bra me so na hu me mmɔbɔ. Hyɛ me den na gye me nkwa, efisɛ, mesom wo sɛnea me na yɛe no.

17.verse: Da papa a wuyi no adi kyerɛ me, Awurade; wɔn a wɔtan me no, sɛ wohu sɛ wokyekye me werɛ boa me a, wɔn ani bewu.

1.verse: Kamfo a wɔkamfo Yerusalem - Awurade kyekyeree ne kurow wɔ bepɔw kronkron so;

2.verse: Israel baabiara nni hɔ a ɔpɛ sen Yerusalem.

3.verse: Tie, Onyankopɔn kurow, nsɛm nwonwa a ɔka fa wo ho se,

4.verse: “Sɛ merehyehyɛ nkurow a wotie me din a, mede Misraim ne Babilonia bɛka ho. Mɛkan wɔn afra Yerusalem ne Filisti ne Tiro ne Sudanfo mu.”

5.verse: Wɔka fa Sion ho se aman nyinaa yɛ ne de na Otumfoɔ bɛhyɛ no den.

6.verse: Awurade bɛkyerɛw nnipa din na ɔde wɔn aka ho sɛ Yerusalem.

7.verse: Wɔto dwom saw, se, “Sion ne baabi a nhyira fi ba.”

1.verse: Osufrɛ - Awurade Nyankopɔn, m’agyenkwa, misu da mu no nyinaa, na anadwo nso meba w’anim.

2.verse: Tie me mpaebɔ na tie me sufrɛ na boa me.

3.verse: Ɔhaw bebree ato me a mereyɛ awu.

4.verse: Mete sɛ afoforo a wɔreyɛ awu no. M’ahoɔden nyinaa asa.

5.verse: Wɔagyaa me ama awufo. Mete sɛ obi a wɔakum no na ɔda damoa mu; mete sɛ wɔn a wɔn werɛ afi wɔn koraa a woboa wɔn a ɛnyɛ ye no.

6.verse: Woatow me akyene damoa ase ne amoa donkudonku a esum wɔ mu mu.

7.verse: W’abufuw wɔ me so denneenen, na abufuw no asorɔkye aka me ahyɛ n’ase ayam me.

8.verse: Woama m’afɛfo apa me na woama me nso makyi wɔn. Maka mfinimfini na mintumi nguan.

9.verse: M’aniwa yɛ mmerɛw ma amanehunu. Awurade, da biara mefrɛ wo na mema me nsa so bɔ wo mpae.

10.verse: Woyɛ anwonwade kyerɛ awufo? Wɔsɔre kamfo wo?

11.verse: Wɔka wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no ho asɛm wɔ damoa mu, anaa wo nokware ho asɛm wɔ ɔsɛe kurom?

12.verse: Wohu w’anwonwade no wɔ sum kurom, anaa wo papayɛ no wɔ awerɛfiri asase so?

13.verse: Awurade, mefrɛ wo sɛ boa me; anɔpa biara mebɔ wo mpae.

14.verse: Adɛn nti na wopo me, Awurade? Adɛn nti na woayi w’ani afi me so?

15.verse: Mahu amane fi me mmofraase na mebɛn owu. W’asotwe ama makisa.

16.verse: W’abufuwhyew bubu me. Ɔtaa a wotaa me no sɛe me.

17.verse: Daa nyinaa, wotwa me ho hyia sɛ nsuyiri. Wofi afanan nyinaa ka me hyɛ.

18.verse: Woama me nnamfobrɛbo apa me, na esum nko na abɛyɛ me hokafo.

1.verse: Dwom a wɔto ɔman amanehunu bere mu - O Awurade, daa mɛto wo dɔ a wowɔ daa no ho dwom; mɛda wo nokware no adi daa daa.

2.verse: Minim sɛ wo dɔ no bɛtena daa nyinaa, na wo nokware no tim hɔ te sɛ wim.

3.verse: Wokae se, “Me ne onipa a mayi no no ayɛ apam; mahyɛ me somfo Dawid bɔ.

4.verse: Daa w’aseni na ɔbɛyɛ ɔhene. Mɛhwɛ w’abusua so daa daa.”

5.verse: Ɔsorofo to anwonwade a woyɛ ho dwom; wɔto wo nokware ho dwom, Awurade.

6.verse: Obi nni soro a ɔte sɛ wo, Awurade. Ɔsorofo no biara sɛso nte sɛ wo.

7.verse: Wodi wo ni w’atreneefo agyinatufo mu, na wɔde suro gyina w’anim.

8.verse: Awurade Nyankopɔn Tumfoɔ, obi kɛseyɛ nsen wo. Biribiara mu, O Awurade, woyɛ ɔnokwafo.

9.verse: Wo na wudi ɛpo ne tumi nyinaa so. Wobrɛ n’asorɔkye ase.

10.verse: Wububu ɔtɔfo Rahab kum no. Wonam w’ahoɔden so dii w’atamfo so.

11.verse: Ɔsoro ne asase yɛ wo dea. Wobɔɔ wiase ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa.

12.verse: Wobɔɔ atifi ne anafo. Bepɔw Tabor ne Bepɔw Hermon to dwom ma wo di ahurusi.

13.verse: Wo tumi so! W’ahoɔden nso so!

14.verse: Wokyekyeree w’aheman wɔ trenee ne nokware so. Ɔdɔ ne nokware da adi wɔ nea woyɛ biara mu.

15.verse: Wɔn a wɔto nnwom de som wo no ahotɔ yɛ bebree. Saa ara nso na ɛte wɔ wɔn a wɔte adɔe hann mu no!

16.verse: Esiane wo nti, wɔn ani gye da mu no nyinaa na wɔkamfo wo wɔ wo papayɛ ho.

17.verse: Woma yedi nkonim akɛse; wo dɔ mu na yedi nkonim no.

18.verse: O Awurade, wo na wuyii ɔhwɛfo maa yɛn. O, Israel Nyankopɔn Kronkron, na womaa yɛn yɛn hene.

19.verse: Tete no, anisoadehu mu, woka kyerɛɛ wo somfo nokwafo no se, “M’aboa ɔsraani a wagye din no; mede ahengua no ama obi a mayi no afi nnipa no mu.

20.verse: Mede ngo kronkron asra m’akoa Dawid de akyerɛ sɛ ɔno na masi no ɔhene.

21.verse: M’ahoɔden bɛka ne ho daa; me tumi bɛma no ahoɔden.

22.verse: N’atamfo rentumi nni ne so da. Amumɔyɛfo rentumi nni ne so.

23.verse: Mebubu n’atamfo na makum obiara a ɔtan no.

24.verse: Mɛdɔ no na madi no nokware. Mɛma no adi nkonim daa.

25.verse: Mɛtrɛw n’ahemman mu fi po mu kosi Asu Efrata mu.

26.verse: Ɔbɛka akyerɛ me se, “Wone m’agya ne me Nyankopɔn; wone me hwɛfo ne m’agyenkwa.

27.verse: Mɛyɛ no m’abakan, ahene no mu nyinaa ɔkɛseɛ.

28.verse: Medi bɔ a mɛhyɛ no no so daa. Na apam a me ne no apam no nso, bɛtena hɔ daa daa.

29.verse: N’abusua bɛtena hɔ daa daa te sɛ wim. N’aseni na daa ɔbɛyɛ ɔhene.

30.verse: Nanso sɛ n’asefo anni me mmara so na sɛ wɔantena ase sɛnea me mmara te,

31.verse: sɛ wobu me mmara so na wɔanni me mmara so a,

32.verse: ɛnne, mɛtwe wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne ho na mɛma wɔahu amane wɔ wɔn mfomso ho.

33.verse: Nanso merennyae dɔ a mede dɔ Dawid no na meremmu bɔ a mehyɛɛ no no so.

34.verse: Apam a me ne no hyɛe no nso, meremmu so, na bɔ a mehyɛɛ no no nso, merenyi mu baako mpo.

35.verse: Menam me din kronkron no so ahyɛ no bɔ prɛko. Merentwa Dawid atoro da.

36.verse: Obenya asefo daa na mɛhwɛ n’ahemman so mmere dodow a owia bɔ yi.

37.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ afebɔɔ sɛ ɔsram, ɔdansefo nokwafo a ɔwɔ wim no.”

38.verse: Nkogu a ɔhene dii ho agyaadwotwa - Nanso wo bo afuw ɔhene a wuyii no no; woatew wo ho afi ne ho na woapa no.

39.verse: Woagu apam a wo ne wo somfo pamee no atow n’ahenkyɛw ato atɛkyɛ mu.

40.verse: Woabubu ne kurow no afasuw nyinaa agu fam ama n’abankɛse nyinaa ayɛ amamfo.

41.verse: Wɔn a wotwam wɔ hɔ wia n’agyapade. N’afipamfo serew no.

42.verse: Wode nkonim no ama n’atamfo. Woama wɔn nyinaa anya ahotɔ.

43.verse: Woama n’akode ayɛ ɔkwa, ama wobedi no so wɔ ɔko mu.

44.verse: Woagye n’adehye akyeampoma atow n’ahengua akyene fam.

45.verse: Woama wabɔ akwakoraa mono de aniwu akata ne ho.

46.verse: Ogye mpaebɔ - Awurade, wode wo ho besie afebɔɔ? W’abufuw bɛhyew sɛ ogya akosi da bɛn?

47.verse: Kae tiaa a me nkwa nna yɛ. Kae sɛ wobɔɔ yɛn nyinaa sɛ adasamma!

48.verse: Hena na ɔbɛtena ase a ɔrenwu da? Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔdasani atew ne ho afi damoa ho?

49.verse: Awurade, wo dɔ a na wowɔ kan no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne bi wɔ he? Bɔ a wohyɛɛ Dawid no bi wɔ he?

50.verse: Mma wo werɛ mmfi kasatia a me a meyɛ wo somfo, wɔkasa tia me no ne sɛnea minya boasetɔ ma abosonsomfo nnome no.

51.verse: W’atamfo kasa tia wo hene a woayi no no, O Awurade! Baabiara a ɔbɛfa no, wɔkasa tia no.

52.verse: Kamfo Awurade daa daa! Amen! Amen!

1.verse: NKYƐM A ƐTO SO ANAN NNWOM 90-106 Onyankopoɔn ne onipa - O Awurade, wo na daa nyinaa woayɛ yɛn tenabea.

2.verse: Ansa na wɔrebɛbɔ nkoko anaa wiase no, na woyɛ Onyankopɔn teasefo, na wobɛyɛ Onyankopɔn daa daa.

3.verse: Woka kyerɛ onipa se ɔnkɔ ne tebea dedaw mu. Wosesaa no ma ɔbɛyɛɛ mfutuma.

4.verse: Mfe apem yɛ wo sɛ da koro. Wofa no sɛ nnera a etwaam no; anaa anadwo mu dɔnhwerew tiaa bi.

5.verse: Wosoaa yɛn kɔe sɛ nsuyiri; yɛntena hɔ nkyɛ sɛ ɔdae mpo. Yɛte sɛ afifide a yɛyɛ frɔmm anɔpa

6.verse: na enyin na ɛyɛ fɛfɛ na ɛwo na ewu anwummere.

7.verse: W’abufuw asɛe yɛn. W’abufuw abɔ yɛn hu.

8.verse: Wode yɛn bɔne gu w’anim; wuhu yɛn kokoam bɔne nyinaa.

9.verse: W’abufuw twa yɛn nkwa nna so; ɛpa te sɛ asomsɛm.

10.verse: Yɛn mfirihyia mu nna, emu wɔ mfe aduɔson, na sɛ ɛboro so a, na ɛredu aduɔwɔtwe, na emu ahohoahoade yɛ ɔhaw ne awerɛhow. Ɛnkyɛ na nkwa asa na yɛkɔ.

11.verse: Hena na waka w’abufuw mu tumi nyinaa ahwɛ da? Hena na onim ehu ko a ɛwɔ w’abufuw mu?

12.verse: Ma yenhu yɛn nna kan sɛnea ɛte, na yɛanya nyansa koma.

13.verse: W’abufuw bɛkyɛ akosi bere bɛn? O Awurade, hu w’asomfo mmɔbɔ!

14.verse: Anɔpa biara, fa wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no hyɛ yɛn mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛto dwom na yɛn ani agye wɔ yɛn nkwanna nyinaa mu.

15.verse: Mprempren, ma yɛn ahotɔ te sɛ nea mfe a yɛwɔ ahoyeraw mu no woma yedii awerɛhow no pɛ.

16.verse: Ma yɛn a yɛyɛ w’asomfo nhu wo nneyɛe a tumi wɔ mu no, na ma yɛn asefo nhu w’anuonyam mu tumi no.

17.verse: Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn, wo nhyira mmra yɛn so. Nea yɛyɛ biara, ma ɛnyɛ ye.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, yɛn hwɛfo - Obiara a wobɛkɔ Awurade nkyɛn sɛ wo guankɔbea, obiara a ɔbɛhyɛ Otumfoɔ no banbɔ ase no

2.verse: tumi ka kyerɛ no se, “Woyɛ me hwɛfo ne me guankɔbea. Woyɛ me Nyankopɔn na mewɔ wo mu ahotoso.”

3.verse: Ɔbɛkora wo afi bɔne a ahintaw nyinaa ne ɔyarewu nyinaa ho.

4.verse: Ɔde ne ntaban bɛkɛta wo so; ne hwɛ mu, hwee renyɛ wo. Ne nokware bɛbɔ wo ho ban.

5.verse: Ɛnsɛ sɛ wusuro anadwo mu amanehunu anaa awia mu ɔtaa

6.verse: anaa ɔyaredɔm a ɛba anadwo anaa amumɔyɛde a ɛsɛe ade awia ketee.

7.verse: Apem totɔ wo nkyɛn na ɔpedu totɔ wo nifa a, wo de, ɛrenka wo.

8.verse: W’ani nko na wode bɛhwɛ na wahu nnebɔneyɛfo asotwe.

9.verse: Woayɛ Awurade wo hwɛfo, ɔsorosoroni no wo guankɔbea

10.verse: enti asiane biara mma wo so, na basabasayɛ biara remmɛn w’atenae.

11.verse: Onyankopɔn bɛma n’abɔfo abɛwɛn wo na baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, wɔabɔ wo ho ban.

12.verse: Wobesuso wo mu wɔ soro sɛnea wo nan renhintiw, mpira.

13.verse: Wubetiatia agyata ne awɔ, agyata a wɔn ho yɛ hu ne awɔ a wɔn ano bɔre yɛ den so.

14.verse: Onyankopɔn se, “Megye wɔn a wɔdɔ me no nkwa, na mabɔ wɔn a wonim me sɛ Awurade no ho ban.

15.verse: Sɛ wɔfrɛ me a, megye wɔn so; sɛ ɔhaw to wɔn a, mɛka wɔn ho. Megye wɔn na mahyɛ wɔn anuonyam.

16.verse: Mɛma wɔn nkwa nna aware. Megye wɔn nkwa.”

1.verse: Ayeyi dwom - Eye sɛ wɔda wo Awurade ase na wɔto dwom de hyɛ wo anuonyam, O Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn;

2.verse: na wɔpae mu ka wo dɔ a wowɔ daa no anɔpa biara na wɔaka wo nokware nso ho asɛm anadwo biara

3.verse: wɔ sanku a hama gu so ne sanku dwom mu.

4.verse: Wo nneyɛe akɛse no, O Awurade, ma m’ani gye; esiane nea woayɛ nti, meto dwom ma me ho sɛpɛw me.

5.verse: Awurade, wo nneyɛe di mu na wo nyansa nso mu dɔ!

6.verse: Eyi yɛ biribi a ɔkwasea ntumi nhu; ogyimifo ntumi nte ase.

7.verse: Amumɔyɛfo benyin sɛ wura, nnebɔneyɛfo bɛkɔ so nanso wɔbɛsɛe wɔn pasaa,

8.verse: efisɛ, wo Awurade, woyɛ otumfoɔ daa daa.

9.verse: Yenim sɛ w’atamfo bewuwu na wɔadi amumɔyɛfo nyinaa so.

10.verse: Woama manya ahoɔden te sɛ torɔm na woahyira me ama manya ahotɔ.

11.verse: Mahu nkogu a m’atamfo adi, ate osu a amumɔyɛfo resu.

12.verse: Atreneefo no bɛkɔ so sɛ abedua, wobenyin sɛ Lebanon sida dua.

13.verse: Wɔte sɛ nnua a wɔadua wɔ Awurade fi a enyin wɔ Onyankopɔn fi

14.verse: a, ɛsow aba ne nyin mu na daa eye na ɛwɔ ahoɔden.

15.verse: Eyi kyerɛ sɛ, Awurade yɛ ɔnokwafo, enti nea ɛnteɛ biara nni me hwɛfo ho.

1.verse: Ɔhene Nyankopɔn - Awurade yɛ ɔhene. Ɔwɔ tumi ne ahoɔden. Wabɔ asase ma atim dennen na wɔrentumi ntu.

2.verse: O Awurade, w’ahengua ase atim fi mfitiase na wowɔ hɔ ansa na wɔrehyɛ bere ase.

3.verse: Ɛpo ase pɛɛ ma ne nne so, O Awurade; wɔma wɔn nne so woro so.

4.verse: Awurade yɛ Otumfoɔ wɔ soro sen ɛpo nworoso ne n’asorɔkye a ano yɛ den.

5.verse: Wo mmara tim hɔ daa, Awurade, na wo fi yɛ kronkron daa nyinaa.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, obiara temmufo - Awurade, woyɛ Onyankopɔn a wotwe aso, da w’abufuw adi!

2.verse: Woyɛ nnipa nyinaa temmufo. Sɔre na fa nea ɛfata ahantanfo ma wɔn!

3.verse: Amumɔyɛfo ani begye akosi da bɛn? Da bɛn Awurade?

4.verse: Awudifo bɛyɛ ahantan ahoahoa wɔn ho wɔ wɔn awudi mu akosi da bɛn?

5.verse: Wobubu wo nkurɔfo, Awurade, wɔka wo nkurɔfo hyɛ.

6.verse: Wokunkum akunafo ne nyisaa ne amanfrafo a wɔte yɛn asase so.

7.verse: Wɔka se, “Awurade nhu yɛn; Israel Nyankopɔn nhu.”

8.verse: Me nkurɔfo, adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ moyɛ agyimifo saa? Da bɛn na mubesua nyansa?

9.verse: Onyankopɔn a ɔbɔɔ yɛn aso; ɔnte asɛm? Ɔbɔɔ yɛn ani; onhu ade?

10.verse: Ɔno na aman hyɛ n’ase; ɔrentwe wɔn aso? Ɔno ne nnipa nyinaa kyerɛkyerɛfo; onni osuahu bi?

11.verse: Awurade nim wɔn nsusuwii. Onim nyansa a enni wɔn nsusuwii mu no.

12.verse: Awurade, ahotɔ bɛn na onipa a wokyerɛ no no nnya; onipa a wokyerɛ no wo mmara no.

13.verse: Woma ɔhome fi nna a ɔhaw wɔ mu mu kosi sɛ wotu amoa ma omumɔyɛfo tɔ mu.

14.verse: Awurade rennyaw ne nkurɔfo; ɔrentew ne ho mfi wɔn a wɔyɛ ne de ho.

15.verse: Wobebu atɛntrenee wɔ asennii bio, na atreneefo apene so.

16.verse: Hena na osii m’ananmu, ko tiaa amumɔyɛfo? Hena na osii m’ananmu ko tiaa nnebɔneyɛfo?

17.verse: Sɛ Awurade ammoa me a anka mekɔɔ kommyɛbea.

18.verse: Mekae se, “Meretew ahwe;” nanso, O Awurade, wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no soo me mu.

19.verse: Bere biara a me ho ntɔ me no, wokyekye me werɛ ma m’ani gye.

20.verse: Wo ne atemmufo a wobu atɛnkyew ma atɛnkyew yɛ atɛntrenee

21.verse: na wɔpam tia nnipa pa na wobu wɔn kumfo no nni biribiara yɛ.

22.verse: Nanso Awurade bɔ me ho ban; me Nyankopɔn bɔ me ho ban.

23.verse: Ɔbɛtwe wɔn aso wɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ no ho na wɔn bɔne nti, wasɛe wɔn; Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛsɛe wɔn.

1.verse: Ayeyi dwom - Bra na yɛnkamfo Awurade! Momma yɛnto ahosɛpɛw dwom mma Onyankopɔn a ɔbɔ yɛn ho ban no!

2.verse: Momma yɛmfa aseda mmra n’anim, na monto ahosɛpɛw nnwom nkamfo no.

3.verse: Efisɛ, Awurade yɛ Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn, ɔhene tumfoɔ wɔ anyame nyinaa so.

4.verse: Odi asase nyinaa so hene fi ɔbodan a emu ware yi so kosi bepɔw a ɛware yi so.

5.verse: Odi ɛpo a ɔbɔe so ne asase a ɔno ara yɛe so.

6.verse: Mommra, momma yɛnkotow nsom no. Momma yɛnkotow Awurade yɛn yɛfo no!

7.verse: Ɔyɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn; yɛyɛ nnipa a ɔhwɛ yɛn; nguankuw a ɔhwɛ wɔn. Muntie asɛm a ɔka nnɛ a ɛka se,

8.verse: “Monnyɛ kɔnsenee sɛnea mo agyanom yɛe wɔ Meriba; sɛnea wɔyɛe wɔ Masa sare so hɔ no.

9.verse: Ɛhɔ na wɔsɔɔ me hwɛe a nso na wonim nea meyɛ maa wɔn no.

10.verse: Mfe aduanan na wɔn ho yɛ me ahi. Mekae se, ‘Sɛ na wɔyɛ nkontompofo! Wɔanni me mmara so.’

11.verse: Me bo fuwii na mekaa ntam se, ‘Morenkɔ asase a anka mede bɛma mo ama moahome wɔ so no so da.’”

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, Ɔhene Kɛse - To dwom foforo ma Awurade! Monto mma Awurade, wiasefo nyinaa!

2.verse: Monto mma Awurade na monkamfo no! Daa mompae mu nka asɛmpa no se wagye yɛn nkwa.

3.verse: Monka n’anuonyam ho asɛm ne nneɛma akɛse a wayɛ ama nnipa nyinaa nkyerɛ aman.

4.verse: Awurade yɛ ɔkɛseɛ enti ɔsɛ nkamfo. Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ no anuonyam sen anyame a aka no nyinaa.

5.verse: Anyame a wɔwɔ aman a aka so no nyinaa yɛ ahoni. Nanso Awurade bɔɔ ɔsoro.

6.verse: Anuonyam ne kɛseyɛ atwa ne ho ahyia. Tumi ne ahotew ahyɛ ne fi ma.

7.verse: Monkamfo Awurade, nnipa a mowɔ asase so nyinaa; monkamfo n’anuonyam ne ne tumi.

8.verse: Monkamfo Awurade din a anuonyam wɔ mu no; momfa afɔrebɔde mmra na mommra n’asɔrefi.

9.verse: Sɛ ofiti na ɔreba a, kotow ɔkronkronni no. Asase nyinaa, mo ho mpopo wɔ n’anim!

10.verse: Monka nkyerɛ aman nyinaa se, “Awurade ne hene! Wɔabɔ asase atim hɔ pintinn a ɛnka ne ho; obebu nnipa atɛntrenee.”

11.verse: Asase ne wim, momma mo ani nnye. Ɛpo ne mu abɔde nyinaa nworo so;

12.verse: mfuw ne biribiara a ɛwɔ mu, mo ani nnye! Nnua a ɛwɔ kwaem de ahosɛpɛw bɛteɛm

13.verse: bere a Awurade rebedi asase so no. Obedi wiasefo so nokwarem.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, Ɔhene Kɛse - Awurade yɛ ɔhene! Asase, ma w’ani nnye! Nsupɔw a ɛwɔ po mu nyinaa, monsɛpɛw mo ho!

2.verse: Omununkum ne esum atwa ne ho ahyia; odi hene atɛntrenee ne nokware mu.

3.verse: Ogya di n’anim a ɛrehyew n’atamfo a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia no.

4.verse: N’anyinam hyerɛn wiase nyinaa; asase hu ma ne ho popo.

5.verse: Mmepɔw nan te sɛ nku wɔ Awurade anim, Awurade a asase nyinaa yɛ ne de anim.

6.verse: Ɔsorofo da ne trenee adi, na aman nyinaa hu n’anuonyam.

7.verse: Wogu obiara a ɔsom ahoni no anim ase; anyame nyinaa kotow Awurade anim.

8.verse: Nnipa a wɔwɔ Sion ani agye, na Yuda nkurow nso ho sɛpɛw wɔn ma w’atɛn a worebebu no, O Awurade.

9.verse: Awurade Tumfoɔ, wo na wudi asase nyinaa so; woso sen anyame nyinaa mpɛn bebree.

10.verse: Awurade dɔ wɔn a wokyi bɔne; ɔbɔ ne nkurɔfo nkwa ho ban. Ogye wɔn fi amumɔyɛfo tumi ase.

11.verse: Hann hyerɛn atreneefo so, na anigye ba wɔn a wɔyɛ papa so.

12.verse: Mo atreneefo nyinaa mo ani nnye wɔ nea Awurade ayɛ ama mo no nti! Monkae nea Onyankopɔn kronkron no ayɛ, na monna no ase.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, wiase Hene - Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade. Wayɛ anwonwade bebree! Ɔnam ne tumi ne n’ahoɔden kronkron so adi nkonim.

2.verse: Awurade bɔɔ ne nkonimdi ho nkae; ɔdaa tumi a ɔnam so gye nkwa no adi kyerɛɛ aman.

3.verse: Odii bɔ a ɔhyɛɛ Israelfo no so wɔ ne nokware ne ɔdɔ a ɔdɔɔ wɔn daa no mu. Nnipa a wɔwɔ baabiara ahu yɛn Nyankopɔn nkonimdi.

4.verse: To dwom a ɛma ahosɛpɛw ma Awurade, mo asase nyinaa, momfa nnwom ne ahosɛpɛw nteɛteɛm nkamfo no.

5.verse: Monto ayeyi nnwom mma Awurade! Mommɔ nnwom wɔ nsanku so!

6.verse: Mommɔ ntorobɛnto ne mmɛn na monteɛm ahosɛpɛw so mma Awurade, yɛn hene.

7.verse: Ɛpo ne abɔde a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa monworo so; asase ne biribiara a ɛwɔ so, monto nnwom.

8.verse: Nsu, mommɔ mo nsam; mmepɔw, mommom nto dwom ahosɛpɛw so wɔ Awurade anim,

9.verse: efisɛ, ɔrebedi asase so. Obedi wiasefo so nokwarem.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn, Ɔhene Tumfoɔ - Awurade yɛ ɔhene; nnipa ho popo. Ɔtena n’ahengua a esi abɔde bi ntaban so ma asase wosow.

2.verse: Awurade yɛ Otumfoɔ wɔ Sion; ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ aman nyinaa so.

3.verse: Obiara bɛkamfo ne kɛseyɛ ne ne tumi a ɛwɔ ne din mu no. Ɔyɛ kronkron!

4.verse: Ɔhene kɛse, wodɔ ade trenee. Woabɔ trenee atenaseɛ wɔ Israel. Woama trenee ne nokware aba.

5.verse: Kamfo Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn; som no n’ahengua anim. Ɔyɛ ɔkronkronni!

6.verse: Mose ne Aaron yɛɛ n’asɔfo, na Samuel ne obi a ɔbɔɔ no mpae. Wɔfrɛɛ Awurade, na ogyee wɔn so.

7.verse: Ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn fii omununkum dum mu. Wodii mmara ne ahyɛde a ɔmaa wɔn no so.

8.verse: O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, wugyee wo nkurɔfo so; woma wohui sɛ wo ne Onyankopɔn a wode bɔne kyɛ, nanso wotwee wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne ho.

9.verse: Kamfo Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn, na som wɔ ne Bepɔw kronkron no so! Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ kronkron.

1.verse: Ayeyi dwom - Monto dwom mma Awurade, wiase nyinaa!

2.verse: Momfa ahosɛpɛw nsom Awurade; momfa ahotɔ nnwom mmra n’anim.

3.verse: Mommma mo werɛ mmfi da sɛ Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn. Ɔno na ɔbɔɔ yɛn na yɛyɛ ne de; yɛyɛ ne nkurɔfo; yɛyɛ ne nguan.

4.verse: Momfa aseda nkɔ asɔrefi no pon mu. Momfa nkamfo nkɔ n’adiwo hɔ. Da no ase, na kamfo no.

5.verse: Awurade ye; ne dɔ tim hɔ daa na ne nokware nso wɔ hɔ daa nyinaa.

1.verse: Ɔhene bɔhyɛ - Me dwom yi fa nokware ne trenee ho, na meto ma wo, Awurade.

2.verse: Me suban bɛyɛ pɛ. Da bɛn na wobɛba me nkyɛn? Mɛtena ase kronn wɔ me fi,

3.verse: na meremma bɔne kwan. Mekyi wɔn a wɔtwe wɔn ho fi Onyankopɔn ho no. Me ne wɔn nni biribiara yɛ.

4.verse: Merenni atoro na me ne bɔne nnya biribiara nyɛ.

5.verse: Mɛtwe me ho afi obi a odi ne yɔnko ho nseku no ho. Na me ne onipa a ɔyɛ ahantan ne atutupɛ remmɔ.

6.verse: Megye wɔn a wodi Onyankopɔn nokware atom na me ne wɔn atena m’ahemfi. Wɔn a wodi nokware pa ara no na mɛma wɔasom me.

7.verse: Ɔtorofo biara rentena m’ahemfi. Na nyaatwomni biara nso remma m’anim.

8.verse: Adekyee biara, mɛsɛe amumɔyɛfo a wɔwɔ asase yi so, na mapam nnebɔneyɛfo afi Awurade kurow mu.

1.verse: Aberante mmɔborɔni mpaebɔ - Tie me mpaebɔ, O Awurade, na tie me sufrɛ na boa me.

2.verse: Sɛ mewɔ ɔhaw mu a, nnan w’akyi nkyerɛ me! Tie me na sɛ mefrɛ a, gye me so ntɛm!

3.verse: Me nkwa reyera te sɛ wusiw; me nipadua rehyew te sɛ ogya.

4.verse: Meretwintwam sɛ sare a awo. Me kɔn nnɔ aduan.

5.verse: Mepene dennen. Menyɛ hwee sɛ honam ne nnompe.

6.verse: Mete sɛ wuram anomaa a ɔwɔ sare so. Mete sɛ ɔpatu a wɔagyaw no amamfo so.

7.verse: Meda hɔ a, m’ani gu so. Mete sɛ anomaa koro a osi ɔdan bi atifi.

8.verse: Daa m’atamfo kasa tia me. Wɔn a wodi me ho fɛw bɔ me din de dome me.

9.verse: Esiane w’abufuw nti, nso ne m’aduan na me nusu fra nea menom mu.

10.verse: Womaa me so tow me kyenee.

11.verse: Me nkwa te sɛ anwummere sunsuma; mete sɛ sare a awo

12.verse: nanso, wo Awurade, woyɛ ɔhene daa daa. Nkyirimma nyinaa bɛkae wo.

13.verse: Wobɛsɔre na woahu Sion mmɔbɔ; bere adu sɛ wuhu no mmɔbɔ; bere pa no ni.

14.verse: W’asomfo dɔ no a ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔasɛe no; wohu no mmɔbɔ a ɛmfa ho sɛ wadan amamfo.

15.verse: Aman besuro Awurade; ahene a wɔwɔ asase so nyinaa besuro ne tumi.

16.verse: Sɛ Awurade san kyekye Sion a, ɔbɛda ne kɛseyɛ adi.

17.verse: Obetie ne nkurɔfo a wagyaw wɔn no na watie wɔn mpaebɔ.

18.verse: Kyerɛw nhoma a Awurade ayɛ no gu hɔ ma nkyirimma sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn a wonnya nwoo wɔn no bɛkamfo no.

19.verse: Awurade hwɛɛ fam fi ne kronkronbea wɔ soro hɔ; ɔhwɛ fi soro besii asase so.

20.verse: Ɔtee ɔpene a nneduafo pene na ɔma wogyaa wɔn a wɔabu wɔn kumfɔ no.

21.verse: Enti wɔbɛpae mu abɔ ne din wɔ Sion na wɔakamfo no wɔ Yerusalem,

22.verse: bere a aman ne ahemman behyiam na wɔasom Awurade no.

23.verse: Awurade ama me ayɛ mmerɛw wɔ bere a minnyinii. Watew me nkwa nna so.

24.verse: O Onyankopɔn, mfa me mprempren a minnyinii yi. O Awurade, wote hɔ daa daa.

25.verse: Tete no, wobɔɔ asase na wode wo nsa yɛɛ ɔsoro.

26.verse: Wɔn nyinaa bɛyera nanso ɛbɛka wo. Wɔn nyinaa bɛtetew te sɛ ntamagow. Wobɛtow wɔn agu sɛ ntamagow na wɔayera.

27.verse: Nanso wote sɛnea wote. Wo nkwa to ntwa da.

28.verse: Yɛn mma bɛtena ase a hwee nyɛ wɔn wɔ wo banbɔ ase, na wɔn asefo nso benya guankɔbea.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn dɔ - Me kra kamfo Awurade! Na me mu ade nyinaa nkamfo ne din kronkron no.

2.verse: Me kra kamfo Awurade, na mma me werɛ mmfi ne nneyɛe pa nyinaa.

3.verse: Ɔno na ɔde me mfomso nyinaa firi me, na ɔsa me nyarewa nyinaa.

4.verse: Ogye me nkwa fi damoa mu na ɔde adɔe ne mmɔborɔhunu bɔ me abotiri.

5.verse: Ɔma me m’asetena mu nnepa na matena ase frɔmm ne ahoɔden so sɛ ɔkɔre.

6.verse: Awurade bu wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so bem na ɔma wɔn wɔn kyɛfa.

7.verse: Ɔkyerɛɛ Mose ne nhyehyɛe, na ɔmaa Israelfo huu nneɛma akɛse a wayɛ.

8.verse: Mmɔborɔhunufo ne ɔdomfo ne Awurade, ne bo kyɛ fuw na n’adɔe dɔɔso.

9.verse: Ɔrenkɔ so nka anim na ne bo mfuw daa nyinaa.

10.verse: Ontua yɛn ka sɛnea ɛfata yɛn, anaasɛ ontua yɛn bɔne ne yɛn mfomso so ka.

11.verse: Na sɛ ɔsoro ware sen asase no, sɛ n’adɔe so wɔn a wosuro no so ne no.

12.verse: Sɛ apuei ne atɔe ntam ware no, sɛ wama yɛn ne yɛn mmarato ntam aware ne no.

13.verse: Sɛ agya yam hyehye no ne mma ho no, sɛ Awurade yam yɛ no wɔ wɔn a wodi no ni ho ne no.

14.verse: Onim nea wɔde yɛɛ yɛn; ɔkae sɛ yɛyɛ mfutuma.

15.verse: Ɔdasani de, ne nna te sɛ sare, ɔyɛ frɔmm sɛ wuram nhwiren.

16.verse: Sɛ mframa bɔ fa ne so a, na onni hɔ, na ne sibere nnim no bio.

17.verse: Na wɔn a wodi Awurade ni no, ne dɔ wɔ wɔn so daa daa na ne papayɛ wɔ hɔ ma nkyirimma

18.verse: ne wɔn a wodi n’apam no ho nokware na wodi ne mmara so.

19.verse: Awurade asi n’ahengua wɔ soro; ɔyɛ ade nyinaa so hene.

20.verse: Mo abɔfo atumfoɔ a mutie ne mmara na mutie nea ɔka no, monkamfo Awurade.

21.verse: Mo ɔsoro atumfoɔ nyinaa ne mo a moyɛ n’asomfo na moyɛ n’apɛde no, monkamfo Awurade.

22.verse: Abɔde a mowɔ baabiara a odi so no nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade. Me kra, kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Ɔbɔadeɛ ayeyi - Me kra, kamfo Awurade! O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, woyɛ ɔkɛse! Wohyɛ tumi ne anuonyam mu.

2.verse: Wode hann akata wo ho. Wotrɛw ɔsoro mu te sɛ ntama,

3.verse: na wusii wo fi wɔ nsu ani. Wode omununkum yɛɛ wo teaseɛnam na wotenaa mu wɔ mframa ntaban so.

4.verse: Wode mframa yɛɛ w’asomafo, na anyinam gya a ɛpa no yɛɛ w’asomfo.

5.verse: Wode asase asi ne fapem so dennen na ɛrentwe ne ho da.

6.verse: Wode ɛpo too so sɛ atade na nsu no kataa mmepɔw so.

7.verse: Wokaa nsu no anim no, wɔyerae; wɔtee wo nne nteɛm so no, woguanee.

8.verse: Wɔteɛ faa mmepɔw so koguu abon mu kɔɔ baabi a na wɔasiesie ama wɔn.

9.verse: Wotoo ɔhye a na wontumi ntra na wɔammɛka asase so nyinaa bio.

10.verse: Womaa nsuwa teɛ faa abon mu ɛnna nsubɔnten nso faa mmepɔw ntam.

11.verse: Ɛyɛɛ beae a wuram mmoa kɔnom nsu; ɛhɔ na akwaku kokum wɔn sukɔm.

12.verse: Nnua a ɛbɛn hɔ no so na nnomaa yɛɛ wɔn birebuw too nnwom.

13.verse: Wotɔɔ nsu fi soro guu mmepɔw so na wo nhyira buu so wɔ asase so.

14.verse: Womaa sare nyinii maa anantwi, na afifide nso, wobɔ maa onipa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obetumi adua nnɔbae,

15.verse: na wayɛ nsa na ne ho atɔ no. Womaa no ngo nso, na wayɛ wɛwɛ ɛne abodoo a ɛbɛma no ahoɔden.

16.verse: Sida a ɛwɔ Lebanon no nso nya nsu bebree. Awurade no ankasa nnua a oduae.

17.verse: Ɛso na nnomaa yɛ wɔn birebuw na asukɔnkɔn nso ayɛ wɔn birebuw wɔ ɔpopaw nnua so.

18.verse: Wuram mmirekyi tena mmepɔw atenten so, na amoakua atena abotan mu.

19.verse: Wobɔɔ ɔsram sɛ ɔnhyɛ abosom agyirae; owia nim bere a ɔkɔtɔ.

20.verse: Wo na wobɔɔ anadwo na ne sum mu na nkekaboa pue.

21.verse: Gyata mma pɔ so bere a wɔreyɛ ha apɛ aduan a Onyankopɔn asiesie ama wɔn.

22.verse: Na sɛ owia pue a, wɔsan kɔhyehyɛ wɔn amoa mu.

23.verse: Afei nnipa kɔ wɔn nnwuma so kɔyɛ aduwma ara kɔsi anwummere.

24.verse: Awurade, woayɛ nneɛma bebree! Nyansa mu na woyɛɛ ne nyinaa; w’abɔde ahyɛ asase so ma.

25.verse: Ɛpo da hɔ tɛtrɛɛ a abɔde akɛse ne nketewa ahyɛ no ma.

26.verse: Ahyɛn fa so, na bonsu nso goru mu.

27.verse: Wɔn nyinaa dan wo sɛ woma wɔn aduan bebree a wɔhwehwɛ.

28.verse: Wode ma wɔn na wodi. Woma wɔn aduan na wɔn ani sɔ.

29.verse: Wodan w’akyi kyerɛ wɔn a, wɔbɔ hu. Sɛ wugye wɔn home a, wowuwu san kɔ mfutuma a wofi mu bae no mu.

30.verse: Sɛ woma wɔn ahome a, wɔba abɔde mu; woma asase nkwa foforo.

31.verse: Awurade anuonyam ntena hɔ daa daa. Awurade ani nnye nea wayɛ no ho!

32.verse: Ɔhwɛ asase na ɛpopo; ɔka mmepɔw na wusiw fi mu ba.

33.verse: Mete ase yi, mɛto dwom mama Awurade; mewɔ hɔ yi mɛto ayeyi dwom mama me Nynakopɔn.

34.verse: N’ani nnye me dwom no ho efisɛ, m’anigye fi ne nkyɛn.

35.verse: Ma wɔnsɛe nnebɔneyɛfo asase so; ma amumɔyɛfo ase nhyew. Me kra, kamfo Awurade! Munyi Awurade ayɛ!

1.verse: Onyankopɔn ne ne nkurɔfo - Monna Awurade ase; monna ne kɛseyɛ adi. Ka nea wayɛ kyerɛ aman.

2.verse: Monto ayeyi nnwom mma Awurade! Monka anwonwade a wayɛ no nkyerɛ.

3.verse: Momma mo ani nnye sɛ yɛyɛ ne de. Momma wɔn a wɔsom no no nyinaa ho nsɛpɛw wɔn.

4.verse: Monkɔ Awurade nkyɛn na ɔmmoa mo na monkɔ so nsom na daa.

5.verse: Mo Abraham asefo, n’asomfo; mo Yakob asefo, ɔbarima a oyii no,

6.verse: monkae anwonwade a Onyankopɔn yɛe ne atɛn a obui.

7.verse: Awurade yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn. Ne mmara wɔ hɔ ma wiase nyinaa.

8.verse: Obedi n’apam so daa daa ne ne bɔhyɛ so kosi nkyirimma mpempem so.

9.verse: Obedi apam a ɔne Abraham pamee no ne bɔ a ɔhyɛɛ Isak no so.

10.verse: Awurade ne Yakob yɛɛ apam a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa daa.

11.verse: Ɔkae se, “Mede Kanaan asase no bɛma wo na ɛbɛyɛ wo de.”

12.verse: Na Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ Kanaan no sua, na na wɔyɛ amamfrafo nso.

13.verse: Wofi aman so kɔɔ aman so; fi ahemman mu kɔɔ ahemman mu.

14.verse: Nanso Onyankopɔn amma obi anhyɛ wɔn so; ɔbɔɔ ahene no kɔkɔ sɛ wɔmmɔ wɔn ho ban. Ɔkae se,

15.verse: “Monnhaw m’asomfo a mayi wɔn; mommfa mo nsa nnka m’adiyifo.”

16.verse: Awurade maa ɔkɔm kɛse bae wɔn man mu hɔ, na ɔfaa wɔn nnuan nyinaa.

17.verse: Nanso ɔsomaa ɔbarima bi dii wɔn anim; Yosef a wɔtɔn no sɛ akoa no.

18.verse: Woguu ne nan nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn, na wɔde ne kɔn hyɛɛ dabedan mu,

19.verse: kosii sɛ nea ɔhyɛɛ ho nkɔm no baa mu. Awurade asɛm daa n’asɛm no mu nokware adi.

20.verse: Afei Misraimhene ma wogyaa no; aman so hene gyaa no.

21.verse: Ɔde no fraa n’amammufo mu yɛɛ no asase no nyinaa so panyin,

22.verse: a na odi ɔhene no mpanyimfo nyinaa so, na ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔkyerɛ n’afotufo no nea wɔnyɛ.

23.verse: Afei, Yakob kɔɔ Misraim kɔtenaa ɔman no mu.

24.verse: Awurade maa ne nkurɔfo woo mma bebree na ɔyɛɛ wɔn den sen wɔn atamfo.

25.verse: Ɔmaa Misraimfo no tanee ne nkurɔfo ani na wosisii n’asomfo no.

26.verse: Afei ɔsomaa ne somfo Mose ne Aaron a wayi wɔn no.

27.verse: Wɔyɛɛ Onyankopɔn tumidwuma yɛɛ anwonwade wɔ Misraim.

28.verse: Onyankopɔn maa sum durui ɔman no mu, nanso Misraimfo no antie ne mmara no.

29.verse: Ɔmaa wɔn nsu nyinaa danee mogya, kum mu mpataa nyinaa.

30.verse: Mpɔtorɔ bu faa ɔman no so kosii sɛ ahemfi hɔ nyinaa danee mpɔtorɔ.

31.verse: Onyankopɔn hyɛe maa nwansena ne ntontom baa ɔman no mu bɔrebɔre.

32.verse: Ɔmaa asukɔtwea ne anyinam danee nsu tɔe wɔ asase no so,

33.verse: sɛee wɔn bobe ne wɔn borɔdɔma bubuu nnua nyinaa gui.

34.verse: Ɔhyɛe maa mmoadabi bae wɔn dodow mu

35.verse: bɛsɛee asase no so mfumduan nyinaa.

36.verse: Okum Misraimfo mmarima a wɔyɛ mmakan nyinaa.

37.verse: Afei odii Israelfo no anim de wɔn puei. Wɔsoaa dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ a na wɔn nyinaa wɔ apɔwmuden ne ahoɔden.

38.verse: Na Misraimfo no suro wɔn nti, wotu fii hɔ no, wɔn ani gyei.

39.verse: Onyankopɔn maa omununkum kataa ne nkurɔfo so, na ogya maa wɔn hann de kyerɛɛ wɔn kwan anadwo.

40.verse: Wobisae na ɔmaa wɔn mmoko. Ɔmaa aduan fi soro bae na wodi mee.

41.verse: Obuee ɔbotan mu maa nsu fii mu bae ma ɛfaa sare no so nyinaa sɛ asubɔnten.

42.verse: Ɔkaee bɔ kronkron bi a ɔhyɛɛ Abraham no.

43.verse: Enti odii ne nkurɔfo no anim de wɔn puei, na wɔtoo nnwom teɛteɛɛm ahosɛpɛw so.

44.verse: Ɔde nnipa foforo bi nsase maa wɔn ma wɔfaa wɔn mfuw no.

45.verse: Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ne nkurɔfo bedi ne mmara ne n’ahyɛde nyinaa so.

1.verse: Awurade adɔe - Kamfo Awurade! Monna Awurade ase efisɛ oye; ne dɔ wɔ hɔ daa.

2.verse: Hena na obetumi aka nneɛma akɛse a wayɛ? Hena na obetumi akamfo no?

3.verse: Nhyira nka wɔn a wodi ne mmara so, na daa wɔyɛ ade trenee.

4.verse: Awurade, sɛ woboa wo nkurɔfo a, kae me; sɛ wogye wɔn nkwa a, fa me ka wɔn ho.

5.verse: Ma minhu wo nkurɔfo nkɔso, na me ne wo man ntena ahotɔ mu wɔ anigye mu ahosɛpɛw a wɔn a wɔyɛ wo de no nya no.

6.verse: Yɛayɛ bɔne sɛnea yɛn nenanom yɛe no; yɛayɛ amumɔyɛ ne bɔne bebree.

7.verse: Yɛn nenanom a na wɔwɔ Misraim no ante Onyankopɔn anwonwade no ase; wɔn werɛ fii ne dɔ a ɔdaa no adi kyerɛɛ wɔn mpɛn pii no, na wɔsɔre tiaa Otumfoɔ no wɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ no so.

8.verse: Nanso ogyee wɔn nkwa sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ wɔn bɔ sɛnea ɔbɛda ne tumi adi no.

9.verse: Ɔkasa kyerɛɛ Po Kɔkɔɔ no ma ɛyowoe. Na odii ne nkurɔfo anim ma wɔfaa asase kesee so.

10.verse: Ogyee wɔn fii wɔn a na wɔtan wɔn no nsam; ogyee wɔn fii wɔn atamfo nsam.

11.verse: Nanso nsu no faa wɔn atamfo no a, wɔn mu baako koraa anka.

12.verse: Afei ne nkurɔfo no gyee ne bɔhyɛ no dii, na wɔtoo ayeyi dwom maa no.

13.verse: Nanso ntɛm so, wɔn werɛ fii nea wayɛ, na wɔyɛɛ nea wɔn ara wɔpɛ a wɔammisa no.

14.verse: Akɔnnɔ bɛhyɛɛ wɔn mu wɔ sare so hɔ, na wɔsɔɔ Awurade hwɛe,

15.verse: enti ɔmaa wɔn nea wobisaa no, nanso ɔde ɔyare bɔne bi brɛɛ wɔn.

16.verse: Na sare so hɔ, wɔn ani beree Mose ne Aaron a ɔyɛ Awurade somfo kronkron no so.

17.verse: Na asase mu buei na ɛmenee Datan na esiee Abiram ne n’abusuafo;

18.verse: ogya sian baa wɔn akyidifo so bɛhyew saa amumɔyɛfo no.

19.verse: Wɔyɛɛ sikakɔkɔɔ nantwinini ohoni wɔ Sinai na wɔsom no;

20.verse: wɔde Onyankopɔn anuonyam sesaa aboa a ɔwe sare ohoni.

21.verse: Wɔn werɛ fii Onyankopɔn a ɔnam ne tumideyɛ so gyee wɔn Misraim no.

22.verse: Anwonwade a ɔyɛe wɔ hɔ no so. Anwonwade a ɔyɛe wɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ no so no so.

23.verse: Bere a Onyankopɔn kae se ɔbɛsɛe ne nkurɔfo no, n’akoa Mose sɔre srɛɛ Onyankopɔn dwudwoo n’abufuw ano sɛnea ɔrensɛe wɔn.

24.verse: Enti wɔpoo asase fɛfɛ no efisɛ, na wonnye Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ nni.

25.verse: Wɔtenaa wɔn ntamadan mu nwiinwii a na wontie Awurade.

26.verse: Enti ɔbɔɔ wɔn kɔkɔ sɛ ɔbɛma wɔawuwu wɔ sare so hɔ,

27.verse: na wabɔ wɔn asefo apete wɔ sare so hɔ afra abosonsomfo mu, na wama wɔawuwu amanɔnne.

28.verse: Na Poer hɔ, wɔde wɔn ho bɔɔ Baal, som no na wodii afɔre a wɔde bɔɔ anyame a nkwa nni wɔn mu no bi.

29.verse: Wɔn nneyɛe no huruu Onyankopɔn bo, na ɔyare a ɛyɛ hu besii wɔn mu.

30.verse: Na Pinahas sɔre gyinae twee wɔn a wodi fɔ no aso maa ɔyaredɔm no gyaee.

31.verse: Wɔde saa asɛm yi kae no daa, na wɔbɛkae daa daa.

32.verse: Meriba asu ho nso, nnipa no hyɛɛ Onyankopɔn abufuw ma, esiane wɔn nti, Mose kɔɔ ɔhaw mu.

33.verse: Wɔmaa n’ani beree sɛ ɔkasa a onnyina nnwen ho.

34.verse: Wɔankum abosonsomfo no sɛnea Awurade hyɛe sɛ wɔnyɛ no,

35.verse: na wodii wɔn ho aware sɛnea abosonsomfo no yɛ no.

36.verse: Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo som ahoni, na eyi ma wɔsɛee wɔn.

37.verse: Wɔde wɔn ara wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea bɔɔ Kanaan ahoni afɔre.

38.verse: Wokunkum mmotafowa a wonnim hwee maa asase no ho guu fi, esiane saa awudi no nti.

39.verse: Saa ade a wɔyɛe no guu wɔn ho fi enti ɛma wodii atoro kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn.

40.verse: Enti Awurade bo fuw ne nkurɔfo; n’ani beree wɔn so.

41.verse: Ɔpoo wɔn maa abosonsom tumi maa wɔn atamfo dii wɔn so.

42.verse: Wɔn atamfo no hyɛɛ wɔn so a wɔyɛ hwee a ɛnyɛ ye.

43.verse: Mpɛn pii, Awurade gye ne nkurɔfo, nanso wɔpɛ sɛ wɔsɔre tia no na wɔkɔ bɔne mu ara.

44.verse: Nanso Awurade tiee wɔn bere a wosu frɛɛ no no na ohuu ɔhaw a wɔwɔ mu no.

45.verse: Wɔn nti, ɔkaee n’apam no na esiane ne dɔ kɛse no nti, ogow ne ho mu.

46.verse: Ɔmaa wɔn sodifo nyinaa nuu wɔn ho.

47.verse: Gye yɛn, O Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn, na san fa yɛn fi aman so bra, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛda wo ase na yɛakamfo wo din kronkron no.

48.verse: Kamfo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn; kamfo no nnɛ ne daa nyinaa! Momma obiara nka se, “Amen!” Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: NKYƐM A ƐTO SO ANUM NNWOM 107-150 Onyankopɔn adɔe - “Monna Awurade ase efisɛ oye; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa!”

2.verse: Ti saa asɛm yi mu fa kamfo Awurade, mo a wagye mo. Wagye mo afi mo atamfo nsam.

3.verse: Ɔde mo afi amanɔnne. Ɔde mo afi apuei ne atɔe, atifi ne anafo.

4.verse: Ebinom nantew sare a ɔkwan nna mu so a wontumi nhu kwan mma kurom mmɛtena mu.

5.verse: Ɔkɔm ne sukɔm dee wɔn maa wɔn anidaso sae.

6.verse: Na wɔn haw mu, wɔfrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn haw mu.

7.verse: Ɔde wɔn faa ɔkwan tee so baa kurom faako a wobetumi atena.

8.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔda Awurade ase wɔ ne dɔ a ɛnsa no ne anwonwade a ɔyɛ maa wɔn no ho.

9.verse: Wɔn a sukɔm de wɔn no, ɔma wɔn nsu nom na wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn no, ɔde nnepa ahyɛ wɔn ma.

10.verse: Na ebinom a wɔyɛ nneduafo a wɔrehu amane wɔ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu te mmɔborɔ ne sum mu,

11.verse: efisɛ, wɔasɔre atia Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn mmara na wɔabu n’ahyɛde so.

12.verse: Adwuma a ɛyɛ den ma wɔbrɛe; wɔbɛtew ahwe na wɔrennya obi nso wɔn mu.

13.verse: Afei wɔn haw mu, wɔfrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee wɔn amanehunu no mu.

14.verse: Oyii wɔn fii wɔn mmɔborɔ ne esum no mu bubuu wɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn no mu asinasin.

15.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔda Awurade ase wɔ ne dɔ a ɛnsa da no ne anwonwade a ɔyɛ maa wɔn no ho.

16.verse: Obubu kɔbere apon twitwa nnade mu.

17.verse: Ebinom kwasea nti, wohuu amane wɔ wɔn bɔne ho.

18.verse: Wohu aduan a, wontumi nnyina efisɛ, na wɔreyɛ awuwu.

19.verse: Afei, wɔn haw mu, wɔfrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn amanehunu mu.

20.verse: Ɔnam ne kasa so saa wɔn yare gyee wɔn fii damoa mu.

21.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔda Awurade ase wɔ ne dɔ a ɛnsa da no ne anwonwade a ɔyɛ maa wɔn no ho.

22.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔbɔ afɔre da no ase na wɔto ahosɛpɛw nnwom de kyerɛ nea wayɛ nyinaa.

23.verse: Ebinom tenaa ahyɛn mu wɔ po so a na po so adwumayɛ na wofi mu didi.

24.verse: Wohui sɛ Awurade tumi yɛ anwonwade wɔ po so nso.

25.verse: Ɔkasae mmaa ahum fii ase tui na ɛwosowoo asorɔkye no.

26.verse: Ahyɛn no pagyaw kɔɔ soro na ɛsan bɔ wuraa po no mu, kɔɔ ase pɛɛ. Saa amanehunu yi maa nnipa bo tui

27.verse: ma wokyim tɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabofo. Wɔn suahu nyinaa ho amma mfaso.

28.verse: Afei wɔn haw mu no, wɔfrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn haw no mu.

29.verse: Ɔbrɛɛ ahum no ase na asorɔkye no yɛɛ dinn.

30.verse: Ɛyɛɛ dinn no, wɔn ani gyei na ɔde wɔn baa hyɛngyinabea a na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔba hɔ no asomdwoe mu.

31.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔda Awurade ase wɔ ne dɔ a ɛnsa da no ne anwonwade a ɔyɛ maa wɔn no ho.

32.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔpae mu ka ne kɛseyɛ wɔ nnipa nyinaa anim na wɔkamfo no wɔ agyinatufo mpanyimfo anim.

33.verse: Awurade maa nsubɔnten yoyowee koraa, na otwaa nsuwa teɛ a ɛteɛ so.

34.verse: Ɔmaa asase pa danee sare a nkyene wɔ mu esiane amumɔyɛsɛm a na wɔn a wɔte hɔ no yɛ no nti.

35.verse: Ɔsesaa sare maa nsu twitwaa mmura wɔ hɔ maa nsuwa nso bɔɔ asase kesee so.

36.verse: Ɔmaa wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn tenaa hɔ na wɔkyekyeree kurow tenaa mu wɔ hɔ.

37.verse: Woduaa mfuw no mu nnɔbae ne bobe na wotwaa nnɔbae bebree.

38.verse: Ohyiraa ne nkurɔfo ma wɔwoo mma bebree. Wamma wɔn anantwi dodow no so antew.

39.verse: Bere a wodii Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo so na wodii wɔn nya atirimmɔden so no,

40.verse: ne bo fuw weretɔfo no ma wokyinkyinii sare a ɔkwan nna baabiara no so.

41.verse: Nanso ogyee wɔn a ade ahia wɔn no fii wɔn ahokyere mu na ɔmaa wɔn abusua no ase trɛwee.

42.verse: Atreneefo hu eyi ma wɔn ani gye na wɔma amumɔyɛfo nyinaa yɛ komm.

43.verse: Momma wɔn a wɔyɛ anyansafo no nsusuw eyinom ho na wonhu Awurade dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no.

1.verse: Mpae a wɔbɔ tia atamfo - Mewɔ gyidi, O Onyankopɔn! Mɛto dwom makamfo wo! Me kra, keka wo ho!

2.verse: Me sanku ne me bɛnta, monkeka mo ho! Mɛma owia akeka ne ho.

3.verse: O Awurade, mɛda wo ase aka aman ho! Meyi wo ayɛ aka nnipa ho.

4.verse: Wo dɔ a wowɔ daa no adu ɔsoro atifi, na wo nokware kɔka wim.

5.verse: Kyerɛ wo kɛseyɛ wɔ soro, O Onyankopɔn, ne w’anuonyam wɔ asase so nyinaa.

6.verse: Fa wo tumi gye yɛn nkwa; bua me mpaebɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wubegye nkurɔfo a wodɔ wɔn no.

7.verse: Onyankopɔn aka wɔ ne kronkron mu kronkron hɔ se, “Ahurusi mu, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu na makyekyɛ Sukot Bon no mu ama me nkurɔfo.

8.verse: Gilead yɛ me de; Manase nso saa ara; Efraim yɛ me dade kyɛw, ɛnna Yuda nso yɛ m’adehye akyeampoma.

9.verse: Nanso mede Moab bɛyɛ me guasɛn na matow me mpaboa agu Edom so de akyerɛ sɛ ɔyɛ me de. Mɛteɛm ahurusi so magu Filistifo so.”

10.verse: O Onyankopɔn, hena na ɔde me bɛkɔ kurow a wɔrewɛn no mu? Hena na ɔde me bɛkɔ Edom?

11.verse: Nokware sɛ woapo yɛn anaa? Woremfa yɛn nsraadɔm ntu sa anaa?

12.verse: Boa yɛn na yentumi nnyina yɛn atamfo anim; ɔdasani mmoa nni mu.

13.verse: Sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ yɛn afa yi, yebedi nkonim; obedi yɛn atamfo so.

1.verse: Ɔhaw mu anwiinwii - Mekamfo wo, Onyankopɔn; nyɛ komm!

2.verse: Amumɔyɛfo ne atorofo aba me so. Wɔka atorosɛm fa me ho,

3.verse: na wɔka bɔne fa me ho, taa me so kwa.

4.verse: Ɛwom sɛ medɔ wɔn, bɔ mpae ma wɔn, nanso wotia me.

5.verse: Papa a meyɛ no, wɔde bɔne tua me so ka, na ɔdɔ a medɔ wɔn no, wɔde ɔtan tua me so ka.

6.verse: Hwehwɛ ɔtemmufo bɔne na onni me tamfo asɛm, na ma ɔno ara n’atamfo no mu baako nkasa ntia no.

7.verse: Ma wonni n’asɛm na wommu no fɔ; ne mpaebɔ mpo, ma wɔmfa no sɛ ɛyɛ awudi!

8.verse: Ma ne nkwa nna to ntwa; ma ɔfoforo nyɛ n’adwuma!

9.verse: Ma ne mma nyɛ nnyanka na ne yere nyɛ okunafo.

10.verse: Ma ne mma nyɛ adesrɛfo a wonni baabi te; ma wɔmpam wɔn mfi amamfo a wɔte hɔ no.

11.verse: Ma n’adefirifo mmɛsesaw n’agyapade nyinaa, na ma amamfrafo nya dwuma biara a odii ho mfaso.

12.verse: Mma obiara nnhu no mmɔbɔ. Mma obiara nnhu nnyanka a ogyaw wɔn akyiri no nso mmɔbɔ.

13.verse: Ma n’asefo nyinaa nwuwu na ma wɔn werɛ mfi ne din wɔ nkyirimma a wɔreba no mu.

14.verse: Awurade, nkae n’asefo na wɔmmfa ne na bɔne mmfiri no da biara da.

15.verse: Awurade nkae wɔn bɔne daa na wɔn de, ɛnsɛ sɛ obiara kae wɔn da biara da.

16.verse: Saa onipa no annwene atirimɔmmerɛw ho; ɔtaa ahiafo, mmɔborɔfo ne wɔn a wonni aboafo kum wɔn.

17.verse: Ɔpɛɛ nnome, enti wɔnnome no! Na onhyira, enti obi nso renhyira no!

18.verse: Na ɔdome te sɛ nea ɔrehyɛ atade, enti ɔno ara ne nnome no nnonom nkɔ ne nipadua mu sɛ nsu, ne ne nnompe mu sɛ ngo!

19.verse: Ma wɔnkata ne ho sɛ ntade na entwa ne ho nhyia sɛ abɔso!

20.verse: Awurade, twe m’atamfo aso saa kwan no so, wɔn a wɔka nsɛmmɔne tia me no.

21.verse: Nanso, wo Awurade me Nyankopɔn, boa me sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no na esiane wo dɔ mu ade pa nti, gye me.

22.verse: Ahia me na minni biribiara. Me koma mu hyehye me.

23.verse: Mete sɛ anwummere sunsuma a ɛreyɛ ayera; mframa bɔ me sɛ aboawa.

24.verse: Aduan a minnya nti, me kotodwe mu agugow; menyɛ hwee sɛ ɔhonam ne nnompe kɛkɛ.

25.verse: Sɛ nnipa hu me a, wɔserew me; wɔwosow wɔn ti di me ho fɛw.

26.verse: Boa me, O Awurade me Nyankopɔn; wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no nti, gye me!

27.verse: Ma m’atamfo nhu sɛ wo ne me gyefo.

28.verse: Wɔbɛdome me, nanso wubehyira me. Ma wɔn a wɔtaa me no nni nkogu, na ma me a meyɛ wo somfo no ani nnye.

29.verse: Ma animguase nnura m’atamfo ho; ma wɔnhyɛ animguase no sɛ atade.

30.verse: Mɛda Awurade ase. Mɛkamfo no wɔ ne baguafo anim

31.verse: efisɛ, ɔbɔ ohiani ho ban na ogye no fi wɔn a wɔabu no kumfɔ nsam.
