1.verse: Awurade ne ne hene a wayi no no - Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me wura, ɔhene, no se, “Tena me nifa so kosi sɛ mede w’atamfo bɛhyɛ wo nan ase.”

2.verse: Awurade bɛtrɛw w’adehye tumi mu afi Sion. Ɔka se, “Di w’atamfo so hene.”

3.verse: Na da a wobɛko atia w’atamfo no, wo nkurɔfo de wɔn ho bɛbɔ afɔre ako bi ama wo. Wo mmerante bɛba wo nkyɛn wɔ bepɔw kronkron no so sɛ anɔpa bɔw.

4.verse: Awurade hyɛɛ bɔ a ɔremmu so se, “Melkisedek akyi no, mo na mobɛyɛ asɔfo daa nyinaa.”

5.verse: Awurade wɔ wo nifa so; sɛ ne bo fuw a, obedi ahene so nkonim.

6.verse: Obebu aman atɛn na ɔde afunu bɛpete akono hɔ; obedi ahene a wɔwɔ asase so nyinaa so nkonim.

7.verse: Ɔhene no bɛnom asuwa a ɛda kwankyɛn mu nsu, na wanya ahoɔden, na wagyina nkonimdi mu.

1.verse: Awurade ayeyi dwom - Kamfo Awurade! Mifi me koma nyinaa mu bɛda Awurade ase wɔ ne nkurɔfo a wɔabɔ gua no anim.

2.verse: Nneɛma a Awurade yɛ no yɛ nwonwa! Wɔn a wɔn ani gye ho no pɛ sɛ wɔte ase.

3.verse: Tumi ne anuonyam wɔ nea ɔyɛ biara mu na ne trenee wɔ hɔ daa.

4.verse: Awurade remma yɛn werɛ mfi n’anwonwade. Ne yam ye na ohu mmɔbɔ.

5.verse: Wɔn a wodi no ni no, ɔma wɔn aduan. Ne werɛ mfi n’apam.

6.verse: Wakyerɛ ne tumi akyerɛ ne nkurɔfo sɛ ɔde ananafo asase ama wɔn.

7.verse: Biribiara a ɔyɛ no, ɔyɛ no nokwarem. Ne mmara nni huammɔ.

8.verse: Bere biara ɛwɔ hɔ. Wɔhyɛɛ no nokware ne trenee mu.

9.verse: Ɔmaa ne nkurɔfo dee wɔn ho na ɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam a ɛwɔ hɔ daa. Ɔyɛ kronkron ne Otumfoɔ!

10.verse: Worepɛ nyansa a, di Awurade ni. Obu wɔn a wodi ne mmara so nyinaa atɛntrenee. Ɔsɛ ayeyi daa.

1.verse: Onipa pa ahotɔ - Kamfo Awurade! Nhyira nka nea odi Awurade ni, na ɔde anigye di ne mmara so.

2.verse: Onipa pa mma benya tumi wɔ asase no so; wobehyira n’asefo.

3.verse: N’abusuafo bɛyɛ adefo na wobedi yiye daa nyinaa.

4.verse: Hann pue esum mu ma nnipa pa, wɔn a wɔyɛ ahummɔbɔ, atimmɔbɔ na wɔyɛ nokwafo no.

5.verse: Nhyira nka obi a ne tirim yɛ mmerɛw wɔ bosea a ɔbɔ ho na ɔyɛ n’adwuma nokware mu.

6.verse: Onipa pa ho nka mu da; wɔbɛkae no daa. Ne gyidi mu yɛ den na ɔde ne ho to Awurade so.

7.verse: Ɔte asɛmmɔne a, ɛmmɔ no hu; ne gyidi mu yɛ den na ɔde ne ho to Awurade so.

8.verse: Biribiara nhaw no na onsuro. Onim pefee sɛ obedi n’atamfo so nkonim.

9.verse: Ne nsam yɛ mmerɛw wɔ ahiafo so na n’ayamye to ntwa da. Obenya tumi na wɔadi no ni.

10.verse: Amumɔyɛfo hu eyi na wɔn bo fuw; wɔhwɛ no ɔtan so na wɔyera. Wɔn anidaso yera kora kora.

1.verse: Awurade nkamfo - Kamfo Awurade! Mo Awurade asomfo, monkamfo ne din!

2.verse: Wɔbɛkamfo ne din nnɛ ne daa nyinaa.

3.verse: Monkamfo Awurade din mfi apui nkosi atɔe.

4.verse: Awurade di aman nyinaa so; n’anuonyam boro ɔsoro so.

5.verse: Obiara nni hɔ a ɔsɛ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn. Ɔte soro soro

6.verse: nanso ɔbɔ ne mu ase hwɛ ɔsoro ne asase so.

7.verse: Ɔma ahiafo so fi mfutuma mu. Oyi ahiafo fi wɔn hia mu

8.verse: ma wɔbɛyɛ ahene mmabarima a wɔfra ne nkurɔfo mu nnamfo.

9.verse: Odi obonini ni wɔ ne fi ma ɔwo mma ma n’ani gye. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Twam dwom - Bere a Israelfo fii Misraim na Yakob asefo fii ananafo asase so no,

2.verse: Yuda bɛyɛɛ Awurade nkurɔfo kronkron na Israel bɛyɛɛ ɔno ankasa agyapade.

3.verse: Ɛpo Kɔkɔɔ hui na oguanee. Yordan nso gyaee teɛ.

4.verse: Mmepɔw huruhuruwii sɛ mmirekyi na nkoko nso huruhuruwii sɛ nguan mma.

5.verse: Dɛn na ɛbae na wo Po woreguan? Na wo Yordan nso, woagyae teɛ?

6.verse: Mo mmepɔw nso, adɛn na muhuruhuruw sɛ mmirekyi? Na mo nkoko, adɛn nti na muhuruhuruw sɛ nguan mma?

7.verse: Asase, ma wo ho mpopo wɔ Awurade ba no mu wɔ Yakob Nyankopɔn anim,

8.verse: ɔno a ɔma abotan dan nsubura na abo dan nsuwa no.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn nokwafo baako pɛ no - Wo nko, O Awurade, wo nko, na ɛnyɛ yɛn, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ yɛn anuonyam, esiane wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa ne wo trenee nti.

2.verse: Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ aman bisa yɛn se, “Mo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?”

3.verse: Yɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ soro; ɔyɛ nea ɔpɛ.

4.verse: Wɔde dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ a wɔnam onipa nsa so na ayɛ wɔn anyame.

5.verse: Wɔwɔ ano, nanso wontumi nkasa. Wɔwɔ ani, nanso wonhu ade.

6.verse: Wɔwɔ aso, nanso wɔnte asɛm. Wɔwɔ hwene, nanso wɔnte ade.

7.verse: Wɔwɔ nsa, nanso wɔnte nka. Wɔwɔ nan, nanso wɔnnantew. Wontumi nso nnyigye.

8.verse: Ma wɔn a wɔyɛɛ wɔn na wɔwɔ wɔn mu gyidi no nyɛ sɛ ahoni no ara.

9.verse: Mo Israelfo, momfa mo ho nto Awurade so. Ɔboa mo na ɔbɔ mo ho ban.

10.verse: Onyankopɔn asɔfo, momfa mo ho nto Awurade so. Ɔboa mo na ɔbɔ mo ho ban.

11.verse: Mo a mosom no nyinaa momfa mo ho nto Awurade so. Ɔboa mo na ɔbɔ mo ho ban.

12.verse: Awurade kae yɛn na obehyira yɛn. Obehyira Israelfo ne Onyankopɔn asɔfo nyinaa.

13.verse: Obehyira obiara a odi no ni; akɛse ne nkumaa nyinaa pɛ.

14.verse: Awurade mma, mo ne mo asefo nyinaa nwo mma!

15.verse: Awurade a ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase no nhyira mo.

16.verse: Ɔsoro yɛ Awurade nko de, na ɔde asase maa onipa.

17.verse: Awufo nkamfo Awurade. Saa ara nso na wɔn a wɔkɔ ase dinn beae hɔ no nkamfo Awurade.

18.verse: Nanso yɛn ateasefo bɛda no ase nnɛ ne daa nyinaa. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Obi a wɔagye no afi owu mu nkamfo - Medɔ Awurade efisɛ, otie me. Otie me mpaebɔ.

2.verse: Bere biara a mefrɛ no no, ogye me so.

3.verse: Owu hama kyekyeree me na damoa ho ahometew twiw bɛn me. Ɛma mebɔɔ hu.

4.verse: Na mefrɛɛ Awurade se, “Mesrɛ wo, Awurade, gye me nkwa!”

5.verse: Awurade hu mmɔbɔ na oye; yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ mmɔborɔhunufo.

6.verse: Awurade bɔ wɔn a wonni bi ho ban. Bere a mewɔ ɔhaw mu no, ogyee me.

7.verse: Nya gyidi, me koma, efisɛ, Awurade ayɛ me yiye.

8.verse: Awurade gyee me fii owu mu; otwaa me nusu so na wamma manni nkogu.

9.verse: Enti menam Awurade anim wɔ ateasefo mu.

10.verse: Sɛ ɛba sɛ meka se, “Wabubu me koraa” a, mekɔ so gye no di.

11.verse: Me suro mu, sɛ meka se, “Obi nni hɔ a yɛde yɛn ho to no so” koraa a, mekɔ so gye no di.

12.verse: Awurade papa a wayɛ me yi akyi, dɛn na metumi de ama no?

13.verse: Mede nsa aseda bɛma Awurade sɛ wagye me nkwa.

14.verse: Ne nkurɔfo aguabɔ ase na mede nea mede hyɛɛ no bɔ no bɛma no.

15.verse: Sɛ Awurade nkurɔfo no bi wu a, ɛyɛ no yaw yiye.

16.verse: Meyɛ wo somfo, Awurade. Mesom wo sɛnea me na yɛe. Woagye me afi owu mu.

17.verse: Mede aseda bɛbɔ wo afɔre na mabɔ wo mpae.

18.verse: Sɛ wo nkurɔfo nyinaa bɔ gua wɔ wo fi wɔ Yerusalem Kronkron mu Kronkron mu hɔ a,

19.verse: mede nea mahyɛ wo ho bɔ no bɛma wo. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Awurade ayeyi - Aman nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade! Nnipa nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade.

2.verse: Ne dɔ a ɔdɔ yɛn mu yɛ den, na ne trenee wɔ hɔ daa. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Nkonimdi ho mpaebɔ - Da Awurade ase efisɛ, oye na n’adɔe nso wɔ hɔ daa.

2.verse: Nnipa a wɔwɔ Israel nyinaa nka se, “N’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.”

3.verse: Onyankopɔn asɔfo nyinaa nka se, “N’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.”

4.verse: Wɔn a wɔsom no nyinaa nka se, “N’dɔe wɔ hɔ daa.”

5.verse: M’amanehunu mu, mefrɛɛ Awurade; ogyee me so ma medee me ho.

6.verse: Awurade ne me wɔ hɔ enti minsuro biribiara. Dɛn na obi betumi ayɛ me?

7.verse: Awurade na ɔboa me na mɛhwɛ sɛ wobedi m’atamfo so.

8.verse: Awurade mu ahotoso ye sen nnipa mu ahotoso.

9.verse: Awurade mu ahotoso ye sen mpanyimfo mu ahotoso.

10.verse: Atamfo pii twaa me ho hyiae, nanso Awurade tumi nti, mesɛee wɔn nyinaa.

11.verse: Baabiara na wɔatwa me ho ahyia nanso Awurade tumi nti, mesɛee wɔn nyinaa.

12.verse: Wɔbɛkyere guu me so sɛ nnowa nanso wɔhyewee ntɛm so sɛnea ogya atɔ nsɔe mu; Awurade tumi nti, mesɛee wɔn.

13.verse: Wɔbaa me so ahoɔden so a na wɔredi me so nanso Awurade boaa me.

14.verse: Awurade maa me tumi ne ahoɔden; wagye me nkwa.

15.verse: Muntie sɛ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ ne ntamadan mu reteɛm anigye ne nkonimdi so se, “Awurade ahoɔden tumi no na ayɛ.

16.verse: Ne tumi abrɛ yɛn nkonim, n’ahoɔden tumi wɔ ɔko mu no!”

17.verse: Merenwu; mmom mɛtena ase na mapae mu aka nea Awurade ayɛ.

18.verse: Watwe m’aso dennen de, nanso wamma manwu.

19.verse: Bue Fie hɔ pon ma me, na mɛkɔ mu akɔda Awurade ase.

20.verse: Awurade pon ni; atreneefo nko ara na wotumi ba mu.

21.verse: Mekamfo wo, Awurade, efisɛ, wotee me nka, efisɛ, woama me nkonimdi.

22.verse: Ɔbo a adansifo poe sɛ ɛho nni mfaso no, na ɛho baa mfaso koraa.

23.verse: Awurade na ɔyɛɛ eyi. Ɛyɛ nwonwa aniso!

24.verse: Ɛnnɛ yɛ Awurade nkonim da. Momma yɛn ani nnye. Momma yenni da no.

25.verse: Gye yɛn nkwa, Awurade, gye yɛn nkwa! Ma yenni nkonim, O Awurade!

26.verse: Awurade nhyira obiara a ɔba Awurade din mu. Yehyira mo fi Awurade fi.

27.verse: Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn. Wayɛ yɛn adɔe. Nnubaa kitakita mo yi, mumfiti afahyɛ no ase na muntwa afɔremuka no ho nhyia.

28.verse: Woyɛ me Nyankopɔn na meda wo ase. Mɛpae mu maka wo kɛseyɛ.

29.verse: Da Awurade ase efisɛ, oye na n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

1.verse: Awurade mmara - Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔn asetena yɛ pɛ, na wodi Awurade mmara so.

2.verse: Nhyira nka wɔn a wofi wɔn koma nyinaa mu di n’ahyɛde so.

3.verse: Wɔnyɛɛ mfomso. Wɔnam Awurade akwan so.

4.verse: Awurade, wo na wohyɛɛ mmara maa yɛn na wokae se yɛnni so nokwarem.

5.verse: Mewɔ anidaso yiye sɛ medi w’asɛm so.

6.verse: Sɛ meyɛ aso ma w’ahyɛde a, m’anim rengu ase.

7.verse: Mesua w’atɛntrenee yi; mede koma a emu tew bɛkamfo wo.

8.verse: Medi wo mmara so; nnyaw me.

9.verse: Osetie wɔ Awurade mmara ho - Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na aberante abɔ ɔbra pa? Ɛsɛ sɛ odi wo mmara so.

10.verse: Mifi me koma nyinaa mu pɛ sɛ mesom wo. Mma mennyɛ asoɔden wɔ wo mmara no so di ho.

11.verse: Mede wo mmara no sie me koma mu sɛnea merenyɛ bɔne ntia wo.

12.verse: Mekamfo wo, O Awurade; kyerɛ me w’akwan.

13.verse: Mɛpae mu mati mmara a woahyɛ ama me no nyinaa mu.

14.verse: M’ani gye sɛ medi wo mmara so sen sɛ mɛyɛ ɔdefo.

15.verse: Misua wo mmara na mehwehwɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu.

16.verse: M’ani gye wo mmara ho; me werɛ remfi w’ahyɛde da.

17.verse: Awurade mmara mu ahotɔ - Yɛ me wo somfo yiye, sɛnea mɛtena ase na m’adi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.

18.verse: Bue m’ani na minhu nokware a ɛyɛ nwonwa wɔ wo mmara no mu.

19.verse: Mewɔ asase yi so mmere tiaa bi; mfa wo mmara no nhintaw me.

20.verse: Me koma ani agyina sɛ ebehu w’atemmu bere nyinaa.

21.verse: Woka ahantanfo anim. Nnome nka wɔn a wobuu wo mmara so.

22.verse: Gye me fi wɔn kasatia ne wɔn atwetwesi mu efisɛ, madi wo mmara so.

23.verse: Ahene hyia pam me tiri so, nanso mesua wo nkyerɛkyerɛ.

24.verse: Wo mmara ma m’ani gye; ɛyɛ me fotufo.

25.verse: Awurade mmara so di ho nsua - Wɔadi me so ma meda mfutuma mu; kanyan me sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no.

26.verse: Mekaa nea mayɛ nyinaa ma wubuaa me; kyerɛ me w’akwan.

27.verse: Boa me na mente wo mmara no ase na mede wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no bɛkɔ adwenem.

28.verse: Awerɛhow ahyɛ me so; hyɛ me den sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no.

29.verse: Mma memmfa ɔkwan bɔne so na wo yiyedi mu, kyerɛ me wo mmara.

30.verse: Maka se mɛyɛ osetie. Matie w’atemmu.

31.verse: Awurade, madi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ akyi; mma m’anim nngu ase.

32.verse: Mede ahosɛpɛw bedi w’ahyɛde so efisɛ, wobɛma mate ase yiye.

33.verse: Ntease ho mpaebɔ - Kyerɛkyerɛ me wo mmara no ase, Awurade, na medi so mmere nyinaa mu.

34.verse: Kyerɛ wo mmara no mu kyerɛ me na medi so; mede me koma nyinaa bedi so.

35.verse: Ma menyɛ osetie mma wo mmara no efisɛ, emu na menya ahotɔ.

36.verse: Ma me ɔpɛ pa na minni wo mmara no so sen sɛ mɛyɛ ɔdefo.

37.verse: Mma minnni nneɛma a ɛho nni mfaso akyi; yɛ me adɔe sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no.

38.verse: Hyɛ me wo bɔ; wo somfo; ɛbɔ a wohyɛ wɔn a wotie wo no.

39.verse: Gye me fi kasatia a misuro mu; w’atemmu yɛ nwonwa.

40.verse: Mepɛ sɛ midi wo mmara so; ma me nkwa foforo efisɛ, woyɛ trenee.

41.verse: Awurade mmara no mu ahotoso - Ma minhu dɔ a wodɔ me, Awurade, na gye me nkwa sɛnea wohyɛɛ bɔ no.

42.verse: Afei metumi mabua wɔn a wɔkasa tia me no efisɛ, migye w’asɛm no midi.

43.verse: Ma menka nokware daa efisɛ, m’anidaso wɔ w’atemmu mu.

44.verse: Mɛkae wo mmara no daa daa.

45.verse: Mɛfa me ho adi kora kora efisɛ, mebɔ mmɔden sɛ metie wo nkyerɛkyerɛ.

46.verse: Mɛbɔ wo mmara no dawuru akyerɛ ahene na m’ani renwu.

47.verse: M’ani gye sɛ midi wo mmara no so efisɛ, medɔ mmara no.

48.verse: Mibu wo mmara no, dɔ no. Mɛdwene wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho.

49.verse: Awurade mmara no mu ahotoso - Kae bɔ a woahyɛ me, wo somfo no; ama manya anidaso.

50.verse: M’amanehunu mu mpo, wokyekyee me werɛ efisɛ, wo bɔhyɛ no maa me nkwa.

51.verse: Daa ahantanfo bu me animtia, nanso mentwee me ho mfii wo mmara no ho.

52.verse: Mekae wo tete atemmu no a, na me werɛ akyekye, O Awurade.

53.verse: Sɛ mihu sɛ amumɔyɛfo rebu wo mmara no so a, na me bo afuw.

54.verse: Me bra kakra a mebɔɔ wɔ asase so no, mehyehyɛɛ wo mmara no ho dwom.

55.verse: Anadwo, mekae wo, Awurade, na midwen wo mmara no ho.

56.verse: Minya m’ahotɔ fi wo mmara a midi so no mu.

57.verse: Awurade mmara no sodi - Wo ara na mehwehwɛ wo, O Awurade; mehyɛ bɔ sɛ, medi wo mmara no so.

58.verse: Mede me koma nyinaa srɛ wo sɛ, hu me mmɔbɔ sɛnea wahyɛ bɔ no!

59.verse: Masesa me suban na mehyɛ bɔ sɛ medi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.

60.verse: Medi wo mmara no so a meretwentwɛn me nan ase.

61.verse: Amumɔyɛfo asum me firi nanso me werɛ mfi wo mmara no.

62.verse: Ɔdasum, mesɔre kamfo wo w’atɛntrenee ho.

63.verse: Wɔn a wɔsom wo ne wɔn a wodi wo mmara so yɛ me nnamfo.

64.verse: Awurade, wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no ahyɛ asase so ma; kyerɛ me w’ahyɛde.

65.verse: Awurade mmara sodi mfaso - Woadi wo bɔhyɛ so Awurade, na wuye ma me, wo somfo.

66.verse: Ma me nyansa ne adwene efisɛ, migye wo mmara no di.

67.verse: Bere a na wotwe m’aso no, na meyɛ mfomso nanso afei, medi w’asɛm so.

68.verse: Wowɔ adɔe, kyerɛ me wo mmara no.

69.verse: Ahantanfo adi atoro afa me ho, nanso mede me koma nyinaa di wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.

70.verse: Saa nnipa yi nni ntease, nanso mewɔ anigye wo mmara no mu.

71.verse: Na m’asotwe no fata me efisɛ, ɛma misuaa wo mmara no.

72.verse: Mmara a wode mae no ho baa me mfaso sen wiase sika nyinaa.

73.verse: Nokware a ɛwɔ Awurade mmara mu - Wo na wobɔɔ me na wokoraa me asomdwoe mu; ma me ntease sɛnea metumi asua wo mmara no.

74.verse: Wɔn a wodi wo ni no hu me a, wɔn ani begye efisɛ, migye wo bɔhyɛ no di.

75.verse: Minim sɛ wubu atɛntrenee, Awurade, na wotwee m’aso efisɛ, woyɛ ɔnokwafo.

76.verse: Ma wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no nkyekye me werɛ sɛnea woahyɛ me a meyɛ wo somfo bɔ no.

77.verse: Hu me mmɔbɔ, na mɛtena ase efisɛ, m’ani gye wo mmara no ho.

78.verse: Ma ahantanfo a wɔka nsɛm a enni mu gu me so no ani nwu. Me de, midwen wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho.

79.verse: Ma wɔn a wodi wo ni no mmra me nkyɛn; wɔn a wonim wo mmara nyinaa.

80.verse: Ma minni wo mmara so pɛpɛɛpɛ na nkogu aniwu amma me so.

81.verse: Ogye mpaebɔ - Mayɛ mmerɛw, Awurade; meretwɛn sɛ wubegye me. Migye w’asɛm midi.

82.verse: M’ani ahwɛ wo bɔ a wohyɛɛ me no kwan abrɛ, bere a mibisa se, “Bere bɛn na wobɛboa me?” no.

83.verse: Me ho mfaso asa sɛ akotokyiwa a wɔatow akyene, nanso me werɛ mfi wahyɛde no.

84.verse: Mentwɛn nkosi da bɛn? Da bɛn na wobɛtwe wɔn a wɔtaa me no aso?

85.verse: Ahantanfo a wonni wo mmara so no atu amoa de asum me firi.

86.verse: W’ahyɛde nyinaa yɛ nokware; nnipa nam atoro so taa me; boa me!

87.verse: Wɔreyɛ anya me akum me, nanso mempoo w’ahyɛde no.

88.verse: Wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no nti, yɛ me adɔe sɛnea medi wo mmara no so.

89.verse: Awurade mmara mu gyidi - O Awurade, w’asɛm no bɛtena hɔ daa daa; ɛwɔ ɔsoro daa nyinaa.

90.verse: Wo nokwasɛm wɔ hɔ mfe nyinaa. Wode asase adua baabi, na etim hɔ.

91.verse: W’ahyɛde nti, nneɛma nyinaa wɔ hɔ besi nnɛ efisɛ, wɔn nyinaa yɛ w’asomfo.

92.verse: Sɛ wo mmara mma me anigye a, anka ɔhaw bekum me.

93.verse: Meremmu wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no so da efisɛ, ɛno na ama mete ase.

94.verse: Meyɛ wo de; gye me nkwa! Mabɔ mmɔden sɛ medi w’ahyɛde so.

95.verse: Amumɔyɛfo retwɛn pɛ sɛ wokum me nanso medwinnwen wo mmara no ho.

96.verse: Mahu sɛ biribiara wɔ nea ɛkɔpem; nanso w’ahyɛde no ho nni asɛm.

97.verse: Awurade mmara no ho dɔ - Medɔ wo mmara no dodo! Midwen ho bere biara.

98.verse: W’ahyɛde ka me ho bere biara. Ɛma m’ani tew sen m’atamfo.

99.verse: Mete ase yiye sen m’akyerɛkyerɛfo efisɛ, midwen wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho komm.

100.verse: Mewɔ nyansa sen nkwakoraa efisɛ, midi w’ahyɛde so.

101.verse: Mapa bɔne su nyinaa efisɛ, mepɛ sɛ midi w’asɛm so.

102.verse: Minnyaa wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu efisɛ, wone me kyerɛkyerɛfo.

103.verse: Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛ dɛ dodo. Ɛyɛ dɛ sen ɛwo.

104.verse: Misua nyansa fi wo mmara no mu, ɛno nti, mikyi suban bɔne.

105.verse: Hann a efi Awurade mmara mu - W’asɛm yɛ kanea a ɛkyerɛ me kwan na ɛyɛ me kwan so kanea.

106.verse: Medi me bɔhyɛ so na madi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.

107.verse: Awurade, m’amanehunu mu yɛ den dodo; hyɛ me nkwa mu den sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no.

108.verse: Gye m’aseda mpae, O Awurade, na kyerɛ me w’ahyɛde.

109.verse: Masiesie me ho sɛ mɛhwere me nkwa; me werɛ mfii wo mmara.

110.verse: Amumɔyɛfo sum me firi nanso, mimmuu w’ahyɛde so.

111.verse: W’ahyɛde yɛ m’agyapade daa; ɛhyɛ me koma anigye.

112.verse: Maka se medi wo mmara so kosi sɛ mewu.

113.verse: Guankɔbea a ɛwɔ Awurade mmara mu - Mikyi wɔn a wɔmfa wɔn ho nyinaa nto wo so; nanso medɔ wo mmara no.

114.verse: Wone me guankɔbea, me hwɛfo. Mede m’anidaso hyɛ wo bɔ no mu.

115.verse: Mo, nnebɔneyɛfo nyinaa, mumfi me so nkɔ. Medi me Nyankopɔn ahyɛde so.

116.verse: Ma me ahoɔden sɛnea wohyɛɛ me bɔ no na mɛtena ase. Nni me huammɔ wɔ m’anidaso mu.

117.verse: So me mu na menya nkwa na daa medi w’ahyɛde so.

118.verse: Wopo obiara a onni wo mmara so. Wɔn adwemmɔne no ho nni mfaso.

119.verse: Wo ne amumɔyɛfo di no sɛ wura, enti mepɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ.

120.verse: Esiane wo nti, misuro; w’atemmu ama ehu ahyɛ me ma.

121.verse: Osetie a wɔyɛ ma Awurade mmara - Mayɛ nea ɛteɛ na ɛyɛ pɛ. Nnyaa me mma m’atamfo!

122.verse: Hyɛ bɔ sɛ wobɛboa wo somfo. Mma ahantanfo nhyɛ me so.

123.verse: Mahwɛ wo nkwagye, wo gye kwan ama m’ani abu.

124.verse: Ma wo daa dɔ no nka me na kyerɛkyerɛ me w’ahyɛde.

125.verse: Meyɛ wo somfo; ma me ntease na mahu wo nkyerɛkyerɛ.

126.verse: Awurade, bere aso sɛ woyɛ biribi efisɛ, nnipa rebu mmara so.

127.verse: Medɔ w’ahyɛde sen sikakɔkɔɔ, sikakɔkɔɔ a ɛyɛ fɛ pa ara mpo.

128.verse: Enti midi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so; mekyi akwammɔne.

129.verse: Pɛ a wɔpɛ Awurade mmara sodi - Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ nwonwa. Mede me koma nyinaa tie.

130.verse: Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no kyerɛ me hann na ɛma nea onnim no nyansa.

131.verse: Mede ahopere bue manom pɛ w’ahyɛde akyi kwan.

132.verse: Dan w’ani hwɛ me na hu me mmɔbɔ sɛnea woyɛ ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo no.

133.verse: Sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no, mma mennhwe ase. Mma bɔne nni me so.

134.verse: Gye me fi wɔn a wɔhyɛ me so no nsam, sɛnea medi w’ahyɛde so.

135.verse: Ma ba a woba me nkyɛn no nhyira me, na kyerɛ me wo mmara.

136.verse: Me nusu gu te sɛ asubɔnten efisɛ, nnipa ntie wo mmara.

137.verse: Atɛntrenee a ɛwɔ Awurade mmara mu - Woyɛ ɔtreneeni, Awurade, na wo mmara nso yɛ pɛ.

138.verse: Mmara a wode ama no ye na ɛteɛ.

139.verse: M’abufuw hyehye me sɛ ogya efisɛ, m’atamfo mmu w’ahyɛde no.

140.verse: Akyinnye nni wo bɔhyɛ ho! M’ani gye ho!

141.verse: Menka hwee, na wommu me, nanso mempo wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no.

142.verse: Wo treneeyɛ bɛtena hɔ daa daa. Wo mmara no yɛ nokware daa.

143.verse: Ɔhaw ne ahopere ahyɛ me ma nanso w’ahyɛde ma me ahosɛpɛw.

144.verse: Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ nokware daa; kyɛ me ntease na mɛtena ase.

145.verse: Ogye mpaebɔ - Mede me koma nyinaa mefrɛ wo. Gye me so, Awurade, na medi w’ahyɛde so.

146.verse: Mefrɛ wo; gye me na medi wo mmara so.

147.verse: Ansa na owia bepue no, mɛfrɛ wo na woaboa me. Mede me ho to wo bɔhyɛ no so.

148.verse: Anadwo nyinaa menna na midwen wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no ho.

149.verse: Esiane sɛ wo dɔ wɔ hɔ daa nti, tie me; O Awurade, hu me mmɔbɔ na fa me nkwa sie!

150.verse: Atirimɔdenfo a wɔtaa me no retwiw bɛn me; nnipa a wonni wo mmara so no.

151.verse: Nanso wobɛn me, Awurade, na w’ahyɛde nyinaa tim hɔ daa.

152.verse: Mmere bi a atwam no, misuaa wo nkyerɛkyerɛ; woma ɛtenaa hɔ daa daa.

153.verse: Mmoa - Hwɛ amane a merehu na gye me nkwa efisɛ, mempoo wo mmara no.

154.verse: Bɔ me ho ban na menne me ho. Gye me nkwa sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no.

155.verse: Wɔrennye amumɔyɛfo nkwa efisɛ, wonni wo mmara so.

156.verse: Nanso, Awurade, w’ahummɔbɔ so; hu me mmɔbɔ na gye me nkwa.

157.verse: Mewɔ atamfo ne wɔn a wɔhyɛ me so pii, nanso mimmu wo mmara no so.

158.verse: Sɛ mehwɛ saa nkontompofo no a, wɔn ho yɛ me tan efisɛ, wonni w’ahyɛde so.

159.verse: Hwɛ sɛnea m’ani gye wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho, Awurade. Wo dɔ nsakra, enti gye me!

160.verse: Wo mmara no koma yɛ nokware na w’atɛntrenee nyinaa wɔ hɔ daa.

161.verse: Awurade mmara mu ahofama - Tumidifo bi taa me kwa, nanso mede nidi ma wo mmara.

162.verse: Wo bɔhyɛ no ma me ahotɔ; me ho tɔ me sɛ obi a watu agyapade bi ahu.

163.verse: Mikyi nkontompo nyinaa na m’ani gye wo mmara no ho.

164.verse: Meda wo ase mpɛn ason da biara wɔ w’atɛntrenee no ho.

165.verse: Wɔn a wɔpɛ wo mmara no wɔ banbɔ a biribiara rentumi mma wɔnhwe ase.

166.verse: Metwɛn sɛ wubegye me, Awurade, na meyɛ nea wohyɛ me.

167.verse: Midi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so. Me dɔ no wɔ me koma mu nyinaa.

168.verse: Midi w’ahyɛde ne wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so; wuhu nea meyɛ nyinaa.

169.verse: Mmoa mpaebɔ - Ma me sufrɛ nnu w’anim, Awurade! Ma me ntease sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no.

170.verse: Tie me mpaebɔ na gye me sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ kyerɛ no.

171.verse: Mɛkamfo wo daa efisɛ, wokyerɛ me wo mmara.

172.verse: Mɛto wo mmara no ho dwom efisɛ, w’ahyɛde yɛ nokware.

173.verse: Daa siesie wo ho sɛ wobɛboa me efisɛ, midi w’ahyɛde akyi.

174.verse: M’ani agyina wo nkwagye mmoa, O Awurade! Menya ahotɔ wɔ wo mmoa no mu.

175.verse: Ma me nkwa sɛnea metumi akamfo wo. Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no mmoa me.

176.verse: Mikyinkyin sɛ oguan a wayera enti bɛhwehwɛ me, wo somfo, efisɛ, mempoo wo mmara no.

1.verse: Mmoa mpaebɔ - Bere a mewɔ ɔhaw mu no, mefrɛɛ Awurade, na ogyee me so.

2.verse: Awurade, gye me fi atorofo ne nnaadaafo nsam.

3.verse: Mo atorofo, munim nea Onyankopɔn bɛyɛ mo? Munim asotwe a ɔbɛtwe mo?

4.verse: Ɔde asraafo agyan a ano yɛ hwirenhwiren ne gyabiriw a adɔ kɔɔ!

5.verse: Mo mu tena yɛ tan sɛ Mesek ne Kedar tena.

6.verse: Me ne wɔn a wokyi asomdwoe atena akyɛ!

7.verse: Meka asomdwoe ho asɛm a, wɔpere ɔko.

1.verse: Awurade, yɛn hwɛfo - Mɛma m’ani so makyerɛ mmepɔw no, ɛhe na me mmoa fi bɛba?

2.verse: Me mmoa fi Awurade, ɔsoro ne asase yɛfo no.

3.verse: Ɔremma wo nan nwatiri. Nea ɔhwɛ wo no, rentɔ nko.

4.verse: Nea ɔhwɛ Israel no, rentɔ nko na ɔrenna.

5.verse: Awurade ne wo hwɛfo; ɔwɔ wo nkyɛn bɔ wo ho ban.

6.verse: Owia renhye wo awia, na ɔsram nso renhyerɛn wo so anadwo.

7.verse: Awurade bɛbɔ wo ho ban afi bɔne nyinaa ho. Ɔbɛhwɛ wo so.

8.verse: Awurade bɛhwɛ w’adifi ne wo fie ba so afi mprenpren de akosi daa.

1.verse: Yerusalem nkamfo - Wɔka kyerɛɛ me se, “Ma yɛnkɔ Awurade fi” no, m’ani gyei.

2.verse: Afei yegyina Yerusalem apon mu wɔ ha.

3.verse: Yerusalem yɛ kurow a ɛyɛ fɛ na asomdwoe wɔ mu.

4.verse: Ɛha na mmusuakuw no fi, Israel mmusuakuw no a, wɔrebɛda Awurade ase sɛnea n’ahyɛde no te no.

5.verse: Israelhene tena ase bu ne nkurɔfo atɛn.

6.verse: Bɔ asomdwoe mpae ma Yerusalem se, “Ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo no nkɔso.

7.verse: Ma asomdwoe mmra wo man mu na banbɔ mmra w’ahemfi.”

8.verse: M’abusuafo ne me nnamfo nti, meka kyerɛ Yerusalem se, “Asomdwoe nka wo!”

9.verse: Yɛn Awurade Nyankopɔn nti, mebɔ mpae srɛ nkɔso ma wo.

1.verse: Mmɔborɔhunu mpaebɔ - Awurade, wo na mehwɛ wo, ɛne ɔsoro a wudi so hene no.

2.verse: Sɛnea akoa dan ne wura no, saa ara na afenaa dan n’awuraa; enti yɛbɛkɔ so ahwɛ wo, O Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn, kosi sɛ wubehu yɛn mmɔbɔ.

3.verse: Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ, Awurade, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ; wɔagu yɛn anim ase ama aboro so.

4.verse: Adefo adi yɛn ho fɛw akyɛ dodo, na ahantanfo nso ahyɛ yɛn so akyɛ.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn bɔ ne nkurɔfo ho ban - Sɛ Awurade nni yɛn afa a, anka yɛbɛyɛ dɛn? Bua, O Israel!

2.verse: “Sɛ Awurade nni yɛn afa na yɛn atamfo baa yɛn so no a,

3.verse: anka wɔn abufuhyew a etia yɛn no, wɔbɛmene yɛn anikann;

4.verse: na anka nsuyiri no bɛtwe yɛn akɔ na nsu no akata yɛn so

5.verse: ama ɔhweam a ano yɛ den no afa yɛn.”

6.verse: Momma yɛnna Awurade a wamma yɛn atamfo ho kwan amma wɔansɛe yɛn no ase.

7.verse: Yɛaguan te sɛ anomaa a wafi ɔbɔmmɔfo afiri mu afi. Afiri no abubu ama yɛanya kwan afi mu.

8.verse: Yɛn mmoa fi Awurade a ɔbɔɔ soro ne asase no nkyɛn.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo ho banbɔ - Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to Awurade so no te sɛ Bepɔw Sion a ɛnwosow na ɛnkeka ne ho no.

2.verse: Sɛnea mmepɔw atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia no, saa ara na Awurade atwa ne nkurɔfo ho ahyia daa daa.

3.verse: Omumɔyɛfo renni atreneefo asase so daa; sɛ ɛba saa a, atreneefo no ankasa bɛdan ayɛ bɔne.

4.verse: Awurade, wɔn a wɔyɛ papa no, yɛ wɔn papa; wɔn a wodi w’ahyɛde so no.

5.verse: Na sɛ wotwe amumɔyɛfo aso a, twe wɔn a wɔpo w’akwan no nso aso. Asomdwoe nka Israel.

1.verse: Ogye mpaebɔ - Bere a Awurade san de yɛn baa Yerusalem no, na ɛyɛ yɛn sɛ dae.

2.verse: Yɛserewee na yɛtoo ahosɛpɛw nnwom! Na aman foforo ka faa yɛn ho se, “Awurade yɛɛ nneɛma akɛse maa wɔn.”

3.verse: Ampa ara ɔyɛɛ nneɛma akɛse maa yɛn; ɛyɛɛ anigyesɛm maa yɛn!

4.verse: Awurade, fa yɛn san kɔ yɛn asase so sɛnea osu san de nsu kɔ subon a emu awo mu no.

5.verse: Ma wɔn a woduaa no nusu mu no ntwa no anigye so!

6.verse: Wɔn a wɔde osu kɔsoaa aba no de anigye de nnɔbae bɛto ahosɛpɛw dwom asan aba.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn ayamye ho nkamfo - Sɛ Awurade ansi dan no a, adansifo no adwuma a wɔyɛ wɔ ho no yɛ ɔkwa; sɛ Awurade ammɔ kurow no ho ban a, awɛmfo no wɛn kwa.

2.verse: Sɛ w’asetena nti, woyeyere wo ho yɛ adwuma a, wosɔre anɔpa na wɔkɔda anadwo kɔnkɔn a, ɛyɛ ɔkwa. Efisɛ, wɔn a wɔdɔ Awurade no, sɛ wɔadeda koraa a, ɔma wɔn nea ɛho hia wɔn.

3.verse: Mma yɛ Awurade akyɛde; wɔyɛ nhyira.

4.verse: Mma a onipa wɔ wɔ ne mmabun bere mu no te sɛ agyan a ɛhyɛ ɔsraani nsam.

5.verse: Nhyira nka obi a ɔwɔ saa agyan no bebree. Sɛ odu atemmubea hɔ na ohyia n’atamfo a, obi rentumi nni ne so da.

1.verse: Osetie ho akatua - Nhyira nka wɔn a wotie Awurade na wodi n’ahyɛde so.

2.verse: W’adwuma na ɛbɛma wo nea ehia wo; wo ho bɛtɔ wo, na woadi yiye.

3.verse: Wo yere bɛyɛ sɛ bobe a ɛwɔ wo fi na ɛsow bebree; na wo mma nso ayɛ sɛ dua a atwa wo pon ho ahyia.

4.verse: Saa na wobehyira onipa a odi Awurade asɛm so no.

5.verse: Awurade nhyira wo mfi Sion! Wubehu Yerusalem nkɔso wo nkwa nna mu!

6.verse: Wobɛtena ase ahu wo nenanom! Asomdwoe nka Israel.

1.verse: Mpae a wɔbɔ tia Israel atamfo - Israel, ka efi wo mmofraase, taa a w’atamfo ataa wo, nanso wɔantumi anni wo so kyerɛ yɛn.

2.verse: “Efi me mmofraase, m’atamfo ataa me atirimɔden so, nanso wɔantumi anni me so.

3.verse: “Wotwaa kam kɛse te sɛ asase a wɔafuntum wɔ m’akyi.

4.verse: Nanso Awurade, ɔtreneeni no, agye me afi nkoasom mu.”

5.verse: Obiara a ɔtan Sion no, wobedi ne so na wɔapam no asan n’akyi.

6.verse: Ma wɔn nyinaa nyɛ sɛ sare a enyin wɔ adan atifi ma ewu no;

7.verse: Obiara mmoaboa ano, na obiara nsoa no afiafi nkɔ.

8.verse: Obiara a obetwam wɔ hɔ no renka se, “Awurade nhyira mo! Yehyira mo wɔ Awurade din mu.”

1.verse: Mmoa mpaebɔ - Awurade, mifi m’aba a abu nyinaa mu refrɛ wo.

2.verse: Tie me sufrɛ, O Awurade; tie me frɛ, na boa me!

3.verse: Sɛ wubu yɛn bɔne ho nkontaa a, anka hena na obeguan atemmu?

4.verse: Nanso wode kyɛ yɛn nti na ɛma yetumi gyina w’abufuw ano no.

5.verse: Meretwɛn ahopere mu, apɛ Awurade mmoa, na mede me ho to n’asɛm so.

6.verse: Metwɛn Awurade ahopere so sen ɔwɛmfo a ɔretwɛn adekyee.

7.verse: Israel, fa wo ho to Awurade so efisɛ, ne dɔ wɔ hɔ daa, na bere biara wasiesie ne ho sɛ ɔbɛboa.

8.verse: Obegye ne nkurɔfo, Israelfo, afi bɔne nyinaa mu.

1.verse: Ahotoso mu mpaebɔ - Awurade, magyae m’ahantan ne m’ahomaso no. Memma nsɛm akɛse, anaa nea ɛyɛ den ma me, nyɛ m’asɛm.

2.verse: Na mmom m’ani sɔ, na mewɔ asomdwoe. Sɛnea akokoaa da ne na basa so dinn no, saa ara na me koma da dinn wɔ me mu.

3.verse: Israel, fa wo ho to Awurade so, ɛnnɛ ne daa nyinaa.

1.verse: Ahobrɛase mu ahotoso mpaebɔ - Awurade, mma wo werɛ mfi Dawid ne ɔhaw ahorow a otumi gyinaa ano no.

2.verse: Awurade, kae bɔ a ɔhyɛɛ wo no; ɛbɔ a ɔhyɛɛ wo, Yakob Nyankopɔn Tumfoɔ no.

3.verse: Merenkɔ fie, na merenkɔda;

4.verse: merenhome, na merenna

5.verse: gye sɛ, mapɛ baabi ama Awurade, Yakob Nyankopɔn Tumfoɔ no.

6.verse: Yɛtee Apam Adaka no ho asɛm wɔ Betlehem, na yehui wɔ Efrata kwaem.

7.verse: Yɛkae se, “Momma yɛnkɔ Awurade fi; momma yɛnsom wɔ n’ahengua no anim.”

8.verse: Awurade, fa Apam Adaka a ɛyɛ wo tumi ho nsɛnkyerɛnne no bra wo fi ha, na tena ha daa nyinaa.

9.verse: W’asefo nyinaa nyɛ nea ɛho tew; ma wo nkurɔfo nyinaa nteɛm anigye so.

10.verse: Wohyɛɛ wo somfo Dawid bɔ. Mpa wo hene a woayi no no, Awurade.

11.verse: Wohyɛɛ wo somfo Dawid bɔ; ɛbɔ a worennan ani se, “Mɛyɛ wo mma no mu baako ɔhene, na w’akyi no, ɔno na obedi ade.

12.verse: Sɛ wo mma di m’apam no nokware na wodi ahyɛde a mede ma wɔn no so a, wɔn mma nso bedi w’ade sɛ ahene daa nyinaa.”

13.verse: Awurade ayi Sion sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔde hɔ yɛ ne fi.

14.verse: “Ɛha na mɛtena daa nyinaa; ɛha na mepɛ sɛ midi hene.

15.verse: Biribiara a ɛho hia Sion no, mede bɛma no. Mɛma n’ahiafo aduan.

16.verse: Mehyira n’asɔfo nea wɔyɛ biara mu, na nkurɔfo bɛto ahosan dwom.

17.verse: Ɛha na mɛyɛ Dawid aseni baako Ɔhene kɛse; ɛha na m’ani beku me hene a meyi no no ahenni ho.

18.verse: Mede aniwu bɛkata n’atamfo ho nanso n’ahemman de, ɛbɛkɔ so frɔmfrɔm.”

1.verse: Onuadɔ ayeyi dwom - Hwɛ fɛ a ɛyɛ sɛ anuanom bom tena faako!

2.verse: Ɛte sɛ ngohuam a esian fi Aaron tiri so gu ne bɔgyesɛ mu na ebi gu n’atade mu.

3.verse: Ɛte sɛ anɔpa bosu a egu fi Hermon Bepɔw so kɔ Sion Bepɔw so. Ɛhɔ na Awurade ahyɛ nhyira ho bɔ; nkwa a ɛto ntwa da no.

1.verse: Kamfo Onyankopɔn - Awurade asomfo nyinaa, mommra mmɛkamfo no, mo a mosom wɔ ne fi anadwo no nyinaa.

2.verse: Momma mo nsa so wɔ fie hɔ na monkamfo Awurade!

3.verse: Awurade a ɔbɔɔ soro ne asase no nhyira wo mfi Sion!

1.verse: Ayeyi dwom - Kamfo Awurade! Monkamfo ne din, Awurade asomfo

2.verse: a, mugyina Awurade fi a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn fi hɔ no.

3.verse: Monkamfo Awurade efisɛ, oye. Monto ayeyi nnwom wɔ ne din mu efisɛ, ne yam ye.

4.verse: Oyii Yakob maa ne ho na oyii Israelfo sɛ n’ankasa ne de.

5.verse: Minim sɛ yɛn Awurade yɛ ɔkɛse; Ɔyɛ ɔkɛse sen anyame no nyinaa.

6.verse: Ɔyɛ nea ɔpɛ biara wɔ soro ne asase so, ɛpo mu ne ɛpo ase pɛɛ.

7.verse: Ɔma ahum mu mununkum fi asase ano ba; ɔma anyinam twa fi ahum no mu na watwe mframa afi ne hintabea.

8.verse: Okum nnipa ne mmoa nyinaa mmakan wɔ Misraim.

9.verse: Ɛhɔ na ɔyɛɛ anwonwade de twee ɔhene ne ne mpanyimfo aso.

10.verse: Ɔsɛee aman pii, kunkum ahene atumfo.

11.verse: Okum Amorihene, Sihon. Okum Basanhene, Og ne ahene a wɔwɔ Kanaan nyinaa.

12.verse: Ɔde wɔn nsase maa ne nkurɔfo. Ɔde maa Israel.

13.verse: Awurade, daa wɔbɔ wo din sɛ woyɛ Onyankopɔn. Nkyirimma nyinaa bɛkae wo.

14.verse: Awurade bɛbɔ ne nkurɔfo ho ban. Obehu n’asomfo mmɔbɔ.

15.verse: Wɔde dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ na ɛyɛɛ aman no mu anyame no; wɔde nnipa nsa nso na ɛyɛe.

16.verse: Wɔwɔ ano, nanso wɔnkasa; wɔwɔ ani, nanso wonhu ade,

17.verse: wɔwɔ aso, nanso wɔnte asɛm na wontumi nhome nso.

18.verse: Wɔn a wɔyɛɛ wɔn na wogye wɔn di no nyinaa nyɛ te sɛ ahoni no ara pɛ.

19.verse: Monkamfo Awurade, nnipa a mowɔ Israel; monkamfo no, mo Nyankopɔn asɔfo!

20.verse: Monkamfo no, mo Lewifo; monkamfo no, mo a mosom no nyinaa!

21.verse: Monkamfo Awurade wɔ Sion, wɔ Yerusalem, ne fi. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Aseda dwom - Monna Awurade ase efisɛ oye; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

2.verse: Monna nea ɔso sen anyame nyinaa no ase; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

3.verse: Monna awuranom mu tumfoɔ no ase; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

4.verse: ɔno nko ara na ɔyɛ anwonwade; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

5.verse: Ne nyansa mu na ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

6.verse: Ɔbɔɔ asase wɔ nsu a emu ware so; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

7.verse: Ɔbɔɔ owia ne ɔsram, n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

8.verse: Owia sɛ ɔnhyɛ adekyee so; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa;

9.verse: na ɔsram ne nsoromma nhyɛ anadwo so; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

10.verse: Okum Misraimfo mmakan; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

11.verse: Odii Israelfo anim fii Misraim; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

12.verse: Ɔnam ne nsa a ɛyɛ den ne ne basa a tumi wɔ mu no so; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

13.verse: Ɔpaee ɛpo Kɔkɔɔ no mu; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

14.verse: Odii ne nkurɔfo anim ma wɔfaa mu; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

15.verse: Nanso ɔmaa nsu no faa Misraimhene ne n’asraafo; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

16.verse: Odii ne nkurɔfo anim wɔ sare no so; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

17.verse: Okum ahene atumfoɔ; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

18.verse: Okum ahene a wɔagye din; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

19.verse: Amorihene, Sihon; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa;

20.verse: ne Basanhene, Og; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

21.verse: Ɔde wɔn nsase maa ne nkurɔfo; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

22.verse: Ɔde maa Israel ne somfo; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

23.verse: Wodii yɛn so nkonim no, ne werɛ amfi yɛn; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

24.verse: Ogyee yɛn fii yɛn atamfo nsam; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

25.verse: Ɔma ɔteasefo biara aduan; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

26.verse: Monna ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn no ase; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

1.verse: Israelfo abooboodi - Yɛtenaa Babilon nsubɔnten ho. Ɛhɔ na yesui bere a yɛkaee Sion no.

2.verse: Yɛde yɛn asanku sensɛn nnua a ɛbemmɛn hɔ so.

3.verse: Wɔn a wɔkyeree yɛn dommum no ka kyerɛɛ yɛn se, yɛnto nnwom mfa nnye wɔn ani. “Monto Sion ho dwom.”

4.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi ato dwom ama Awurade wɔ ananafo asase so?

5.verse: Sɛ me werɛ fi wo Yerusalem a, ɛnsɛ sɛ mitumi bɔ sanku no bio!

6.verse: Sɛ mekae wo na mannwene wo ho sɛ m’ahosɛpɛw a, ɛnsɛ sɛ mitumi to dwom bio.

7.verse: Awurade, kae nea Edomfo yɛe da a wɔfaa Yerusalem dommum no. Kae nea wɔka tii mu no se, “Bubu no gu fam!” no.

8.verse: Babilon, wɔbɛsɛe wo. Nhyira nka nea obetua mo nea moyɛ yɛn no so ka;

9.verse: nea ɔfaa mo nkokoaa na ɔpɛtɛw wɔn ɔbotan so no.

1.verse: Aseda mpaebɔ - Awurade, mifi me koma nyinaa mu meda wo ase. Meto wo ayeyi dwom wɔ anyame no anim.

2.verse: M’ani kyerɛ wo fi kronkron no, kotow, kamfo wo din esiane wo dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no ne wo nokware nti, efisɛ woada no adi sɛ, wo din ne w’ahyɛde yɛ tumi.

3.verse: Bere a mefrɛɛ wo no, wubuaa me; wonam w’ahoɔden so hyɛɛ me den.

4.verse: Ahene a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa bɛkamfo wo, Awurade efisɛ, wɔate wo bɔhyɛ no.

5.verse: Wɔbɛto nea woayɛ ne w’anuonyam kɛse no ho dwom.

6.verse: Ɛwom sɛ wokorɔn de, nanso wohwɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ fam pɛɛ no na ahantanfo rentumi mfa wɔn ho nhintaw wo.

7.verse: Sɛ ɔhaw twa me ho hyia a, wugye me. Woko tia m’atamfo a wɔn bo afuw no, na wonam wo tumi so gye me.

8.verse: Ɛbɔ biara a woahyɛ no, wubedi so; Awurade, wo dɔ wɔ hɔ daa.Wie adwuma a wafi ase no.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn nyansa ne ne hwɛ - Awurade, woahwehwɛ me mu na woahu me.

2.verse: Wunim biribiara a meyɛ; wuhu me nsusuwii nyinaa fi akyirikyiri.

3.verse: Sɛ mereyɛ adwuma a, wuhu; sɛ merehome nso a, saa ara. Wunim m’ahokeka nyinaa.

4.verse: Ansa na mebue m’ano akasa no, na wunim asɛm a mɛka.

5.verse: Woatwa me ho ahyia. Wonam wo tumi so bɔ me ho ban.

6.verse: Me ho adwene a wowɔ no du akyiri. Ɛboro m’adwene so.

7.verse: Ɛhe na metumi aguan wo mafa? Ɛhe na metumi aguan afi w’anim mafa?

8.verse: Sɛ meforo soro a, wowɔ hɔ. Na mekɔsɛw me kɛtɛ asaman a, wo ni!

9.verse: Sɛ mefa adekyee ntaban mitu mekɔtena po akyi nohɔ a,

10.verse: ɛhɔ nso na wo nsa bɛkɔ akogya me na wo nifa beso me mu.

11.verse: Na sɛ mise, esum nko mmɛkata me so na me ho hann nnan sum a,

12.verse: esum nso nnuru sum mma wo, na anadwo hran sɛ awia; esum ne hann yɛ wo pɛ.

13.verse: M’akwaa nyinaa wo na wobɔe; wokekaa me sisii anim wɔ me na yam.

14.verse: Mekamfo wo efisɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ wosuro wo; nea woyɛ nyinaa yɛ hu na ɛyɛ nwonwa. Minim ne nyinaa wɔ me koma mu.

15.verse: Bere a wɔreyɛ me nnompe no wɔkeka sisii anim brɛoo wɔ me na yafunu mu. Bere a merenyin dinn wɔ hɔ no, na wunim sɛ mewɔ hɔ;

16.verse: wuhuu me ansa na wɔrewo me. Nna dodow a woatwa ama me no, ansa na ɛrebefiti ase no, na woakyerɛw wɔ wo nhoma mu dedaw.

17.verse: O Onyankopɔn, ɛyɛ den sɛ mehu wo nsusuwii; sɛ ne dodow yɛ ahe!

18.verse: Sɛ mise mɛkan a, ne dodow bɛboro mpoano anhwea. Mesɔre a, meda so ne wo wɔ hɔ.

19.verse: O Onyankopɔn, me pɛ ne sɛ anka wubekum amumɔyɛfo! Me pɛ ne sɛ basabasayɛfo begyaa me haw!

20.verse: Wɔka amumɔyɛsɛm fa wo ho; wɔka bɔne fa wo din ho.

21.verse: O Awurade, mikyi wɔn a wokyi wo na mimmu wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo no nso.

22.verse: Mikyi wɔn kɔkɔɔkɔ; mefa wɔn sɛ m’atamfo.

23.verse: Hwehwɛ me mu, O Onyankopɔn, na hu m’adwene; sɔ me hwɛ na hu m’adwene.

24.verse: Na hwɛ sɛ amane kwan bi wɔ me hɔ, na gya me kɔ daa kwan so!

1.verse: Banbɔ mpaebɔ - Awurade, gye me fi nnebɔneyɛfo nsam; na bɔ me ho ban fi basabasayɛfo nsam.

2.verse: Daa wɔdwene bɔne ho na wɔakɔka ntɔkwaw.

3.verse: Wɔn tɛkrɛma te sɛ awɔ a bɔre ahyɛ wɔn ma.

4.verse: Awurade, bɔ me ho ban fi amumɔyɛfo tumi ase; gye me fi basabasayɛfo a wɔdwene tia me, pɛ m’asehwe no nsam.

5.verse: Ahantanfo asum me firi; wɔasum wɔn mfiri na ɔkwan ho nyinaa wɔasunsum mfiri repɛ me ayi me.

6.verse: Meka kyerɛ Awurade se, “Wone me Nyankopɔn.” Tie me sufrɛ na boa me, Awurade!

7.verse: Awurade me Nyankopɔn, me hwɛfo dennen, woabɔ me ho ban wɔ ɔko mu.

8.verse: Awurade, mfa nea amumɔyɛfo hwehwɛ mma wɔn; mma wɔn nsusuw bɔne no nnni nkonim.

9.verse: Mma m’atamfo nnni nkonim. Ma ahunahuna a wɔrehunahuna me no ntew mfa wɔn so.

10.verse: Ma nnyansrama ngu wɔn so. Ma wɔntow wɔn ngu amoa donkudonku a wɔrentumi mfi bio mu.

11.verse: Ma wɔn a wɔka nsɛmmɔne gu wɔn yɔnkonom so no nni nkogu. Ma bɔne nni basabasayɛfo so na ɛnsɛe wɔn.

12.verse: Awurade, minim sɛ woko gye ahiafo ma wonya wɔn kyɛfa.

13.verse: Atreneefo bɛkamfo wo ampa; wɔbɛtena nkwa mu wɔ wo nkyɛn.

1.verse: Anwummere mpaebɔ - Merefrɛ wo, Awurade, boa me mprempren! Sɛ mefrɛ wo a, gye me so.

2.verse: Gye me mpaebɔ sɛ aduhuam ne me nsa a mapagyaw sɛ anwummere afɔrebɔ.

3.verse: Awurade, wɛn m’ano na ɔwɛmfo mmɛwɛn m’anofafa.

4.verse: Twe me fi bɔne a mepɛ sɛ meyɛ ho na mma memmfa me ho mmmɔ nnebɔneyɛfo wɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ mu. Na mma mennkɔ wɔn adidi ase.

5.verse: Onipa pa betumi atwe m’aso aka m’anim ayamye so, nanso menhwehwɛ nnebɔneyɛfo nkyɛn anuonyam efisɛ, daa mebɔ mpae tia wɔn nneyɛe bɔne no.

6.verse: Sɛ wɔtow wɔn ahemfo fi abotan mmepɔw so bɛhwe fam a, nnipa begye adi sɛ me nsɛm a meka no yɛ nokware.

7.verse: Wɔte sɛ dua a wɔapae mu na wɔatwitwa mu asinasin; saa na wɔn nnompe bɛbɔ ahwete wɔ damoa ho.

8.verse: Nanso Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, mekɔ so de me ho to wo so. Mehwehwɛ wo banbɔ. Mma me nnwu!

9.verse: Bɔ me ho ban fi mfiri a wɔasunsum me no mu ne nnebɔneyɛfo firi mu.

10.verse: Ma nnebɔneyɛfo no ara firi nyi wɔn na menkɔ me baabi asomdwoe mu.

1.verse: Mmoa mpaebɔ - Misu frɛ Awurade sɛ ɔmmoa me; mesrɛ no.

2.verse: Meka me nsɛm nyinaa kyerɛ no; meka me haw nyinaa kyerɛ no.

3.verse: Sɛ mereyɛ apa abaw a, onim nea ɛsɛ sɛ meyɛ. Ɔkwan a menam so no m’atamfo asum me firi wɔ so.

4.verse: Sɛ mehwɛ me ho a, minhu ɔboafo biara; ɔbanbɔfo nso nni hɔ. Obiara nso nhwɛ me.

5.verse: Awurade, misu frɛ wo sɛ boa me; wo Awurade, wone me hwɛfo. Wone nea ne ho hia me wɔ m’asetena nyinaa mu.

6.verse: Tie me sufrɛ na boa me efisɛ, m’aba mu abu. Gye me fi m’atamfo nsam efisɛ, wɔyɛ den ma me dodo.

7.verse: Yi m’awerɛhow fi me so na esiane papa a woayɛ me nti, mɛkamfo wo wɔ wo nkurɔfo gua a wɔabɔ mu.

1.verse: Mmoa mpaebɔ - Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ! Wo trenee mu, tie m’adesrɛ. Gye me so wɔ wo nokware turodoo mu!

2.verse: Nsɔ me, w’akoa, nhwɛ! Obiara nyɛ pɛ w’anim.

3.verse: Me tamfo apɛ me anya me na wadi me so koraa. Ɔde me ato afiase sum mu na mayɛ sɛ wɔn a wowuwui dedaadaw no.

4.verse: Ɛno nti, mereyɛ apa abaw. M’aba mu abu.

5.verse: Mekae mmere a atwam no; midwen nea woayɛ nyinaa. Mekae wo nnwuma nyinaa.

6.verse: Mepagyaw me nsa kyerɛ wo so wɔ mpaebɔ mu; wo ho sukɔm de me kra sɛ asase kesee.

7.verse: Awurade, bua me mprempren ara! M’anidaso asa. Mfa wo ho nhintaw me anyɛ saa a, mɛfra nsamanfo mu.

8.verse: Daa anɔpa, kae me wo dɔ a wodɔ me no efisɛ, mede me ho to wo so. Me mpaebɔ ba wo nkyɛn. Kyerɛ me kwan a memfa so.

9.verse: Awurade, mekɔ wo nkyɛn kɔpɛ hintabea, gye me fi m’atamfo nsam.

10.verse: Woyɛ me Nyankopɔn; kyerɛ me na menyɛ w’apɛde. Hwɛ me yiye na kyerɛ me kwan pa a memfa so.

11.verse: Gye me, Awurade, sɛnea woahyɛ me bɔ no; fa wo papayɛ so gye me fi ɔhaw mu!

12.verse: Esiane ɔdɔ a wodɔ me nti, kum m’atamfo na sɛe wɔn a wɔhyɛ me so nyinaa efisɛ, meyɛ wo somfo.

1.verse: Ɔhene da Onyankopɔn ase nkonimdi ho - Kamfo Awurade, me hwɛfo! Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me, siesie me ma ɔko.

2.verse: Ɔyɛ me hwɛfo, me guankɔbea ne m’agyenkwa a mede me ho to ne so. Ɔbrɛ aman a wɔhyɛ m’ase no ase.

3.verse: Awurade, dɛn ne onipa a wuhu no yi? Onipa teta a w’ani ku ne ho?

4.verse: Ɔte sɛ mframa mu tutuw; ne nna te sɛ sunsuma a ɛretwam.

5.verse: O Awurade, pae ɔsoro mu na sian bra fam. Fa wo nsa ka mmepɔw na ebefi wusiw.

6.verse: Ma anyinam mpaapae na bɔ w’atamfo hwete; tow w’agyan na wonguan.

7.verse: Fi soro sian. Yi me fi subon mu na gye me. Gye me fi ananafo tumi ase,

8.verse: wɔn a wɔnka nokware na mpo wotwa atoro wɔ ntanka akyi no.

9.verse: Mɛto dwom foforo ama wo, O Onyankopɔn; mɛbɔ sanku na mato dwom mama wo.

10.verse: Ma ahene nni nkonim na gye wo somfo Dawid.

11.verse: Gye me fi m’atamfo atirimɔdenfo nsam; gye me fi ananafo tumi ase; wɔn a wɔnka nokware na mpo wotwa atoro wɔ ntanka akyi no.

12.verse: Ma yɛn mma mmarima nnyin wɔ wɔn mmabun mu sɛ afifide a enyin ahoɔden so no. Ma yɛn mma mma nyɛ sɛ ɔman adum a wɔde asiesie ahemfi twea so.

13.verse: Ma yɛmfa afude nyinaa bi nhyɛ pata so ma. Ma yɛn nguan nwo mpempem.

14.verse: Ma yɛn anantwi nwo bebree a wɔmpɔn na wɔn mu bi nso nyera. Mma osu ne awerɛhow mma yɛn aborɔn so.

15.verse: Nhyira nka ɔman a ɛbɛba mu saa ama no. Nhyira nka nnipa a wɔn Nyankopɔn ne Awurade!

1.verse: Ayeyi dwom - Mɛpae mu maka wo kɛseyɛ, me Nyankopɔn ne me hene; mɛda wo ase daa nyinaa.

2.verse: Da biara, mɛda wo ase; mɛkamfo wo daa nyinaa.

3.verse: Awurade yɛ kɛse na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkamfo no. Ne kɛseyɛ boro adwene so.

4.verse: Wɔbɛkamfo nea woayɛ fi nkyirimma so kosi nkyirimma so; wɔbɛka wo nnwuma akɛse no.

5.verse: Wɔbɛka w’anuonyam ne wo tumi ho asɛm, na medwen w’anwonwadwuma no ho.

6.verse: Nnipa bɛka wo nnwuma akɛse ho asɛm; na mɛda wo kɛseyɛ adi.

7.verse: Wɔbɛka wo papayɛ ho asɛm; na wɔato w’ayamye nso ho dwom.

8.verse: Awurade yɛ ɔdɔ ne mmɔborɔhunufo; ne bo kyɛ fuw na n’adɔe dɔɔso.

9.verse: Oye ma obiara na ɔwɔ ahummɔbɔ ma n’abɔde.

10.verse: Awurade, w’abɔde nyinaa bɛkamfo wo; na wo nkurɔfo nyinaa bɛda wo ase.

11.verse: Wɔbɛka anuonyam a ɛwɔ w’adehye tumi no ho asɛm na wɔaka wo tumi no ho asɛm nso,

12.verse: sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obiara behu wo nnwuma akɛse no ne w’ahemman a, anuonyam ne tumi wɔ mu no.

13.verse: W’ahenni to rentwa da, na woyɛ ɔhene daa daa. Awurade hyɛ bɔ a, odi so, na biribiara a ɔyɛ, yɛ pɛ.

14.verse: Ɔboa wɔn a wɔwɔ ɔhaw mu. Ɔpagyaw wɔn a wɔahwe ase.

15.verse: Ani nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan na woma wɔn aduan wɔ ne bere mu.

16.verse: Woma wɔn dodow, na nea ehia obiara no, wode ma no.

17.verse: Awurade yɛ trenee wɔ nea ɔyɛ biara mu; ohu mmɔbɔ wɔ ne nneyɛe mu.

18.verse: Ɔbɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no no, wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nokware mu no.

19.verse: Wɔn a wodii no ni no, ɔma wɔn nea ehia wɔn; otie wɔn sufrɛ gye wɔn.

20.verse: Ɔbɔ obiara a ɔdɔ no no ho ban na ɔbɛsɛe amumɔyɛfo.

21.verse: Mɛkamfo Awurade daa; ma abɔde nyinaa nkamfo ne din kronkron no daa daa.

1.verse: Kamfo Agyenkwa Nyankopɔn - Kamfo Awurade! Me kra, kamfo Awurade!

2.verse: Meda so te ase yi, mɛkamfo no. Mɛto me Nyankopɔn dwom me nkwa nna nyinaa.

3.verse: Mommfa mo ho nnto ahemfo so efisɛ, onipa rentumi nnye wo.

4.verse: Sɛ wowu a, wɔsan kɔ mfutuma mu; saa da no wɔn nsusuwii nyinaa ba n’awiei.

5.verse: Nhyira nka nea ɔwɔ Yakob Nyankopɔn sɛ ne boafo, na ɔde ne ho to n’awurade ne ne Nyankopɔn,

6.verse: nea ɔbɔɔ soro, asase ne ɛpo ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa no so no. Odi ne bɔhyɛ so daa.

7.verse: Odi ma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so, na ɔma wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn nso aduan. Awurade gyaa nneduafo

8.verse: na ɔma anifuraefo hu ade. Ɔma wɔn a wɔahwe ase so. Ɔdɔ n’atreneefo.

9.verse: Ɔbɔ ahɔho a wɔte yɛn asase so ho ban. Ɔboa akunafo ne nyisaa na mmom ɔsɛe amumɔyɛfo nsusuwii.

10.verse: Awurade yɛ ɔhene daa daa. Wo Nyankopɔn, O Sion, bedi hene daa nyinaa. Kamfo Awurade.

1.verse: Onyankopɔn Tumfoɔ nkamfo - Eye sɛ wɔto ayeyi dwom de kamfo Onyankopɔn; eye na ɛfata sɛ wɔkamfo no.

2.verse: Awurade resesɛw Yerusalem. Ɔde wɔn a wotu fii hɔ no resan aba.

3.verse: Ɔsa wɔn a wɔn koma atu yare na ɔkyekyere wɔn akuru.

4.verse: Wadwen nsoromma dodow ne din a ɔde bɛma wɔn mu biara no ho dedaw.

5.verse: Yɛn Awurade so na ɔyɛ ɔkɛse; obi nte ne nyansa ase.

6.verse: Ɔma ahobrɛasefo so na obubu amumɔyɛfo gu fam.

7.verse: Monto ayeyi nnwom mma Awurade. Mommɔ nnwom wɔ sanku so mma Onyankopɔn.

8.verse: Ɔma omununkum trɛw ɔsoro ani; ɔma asase osu. Ɔma sare nyin mmepɔw so.

9.verse: Ɔma mmoa aduan na sɛ kwaakwaadabi mma su frɛ no a, ɔma wɔn aduan di.

10.verse: N’anikade nni apɔnkɔ a wɔn ho yɛ den ne asraafo akokodurufo mu.

11.verse: Na mmom, n’ani gye wɔn a wodi no ni ne wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ne dɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no so no ho.

12.verse: Kamfo Awurade, O Yerusalem! Kamfo wo Nyankopɔn, O Sion!

13.verse: Ɔma w’apon mu yɛ den; ohyira mo nkurɔfo.

14.verse: Ɔkora mo ahye so na ɔma mo awi pa.

15.verse: Ɔkasa kyerɛ asase. Na nea ɔka biara, wɔyɛ no ntɛm so.

16.verse: Ɔtɔ sukyerɛmma sɛ nnaso, na ɔtrɛw obosu nsukyenee mu sɛ mfutuma.

17.verse: Ɔtɔ asukɔtweaa sɛ mmosea. Obi ntumi nnyina awɔw a ɔde ba ano!

18.verse: Na afei, ɔkasa ma sukyerɛmma no nan. Ɔbɔ mframa ma nsu teɛ.

19.verse: Ɔkasa kyerɛ ne nkurɔfo. Ɔhyɛ mmara ma Israel.

20.verse: Ɔnyɛɛ eyi mmaa aman foforo biara. Wonnim ne mmara. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Biribiara nkamfo Onyankopɔn - Kamfo Awurade! Mo a mote ɔsorosoro, monkamfo Awurade mfi soro!

2.verse: N’abɔfo ne ne soro asafodɔm nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade.

3.verse: Kamfo no, owia ne ɔsram; kamfo no, nsoromma a mohyerɛn.

4.verse: Kamfo no, ɔsorosoro ne nsu a ɛboro wim so.

5.verse: Momma wɔn nyinaa nkamfo Awurade din. Ɔkasae na wɔbɔɔ wɔn;

6.verse: ɔkasae na wɔde wɔn tuatuaa nea wɔwɔ hɔ yi afebɔɔ na wɔrentumi mmu so.

7.verse: Kamfo Awurade fi asase so, nsuboa ne po ase pɛɛ,

8.verse: anyinam ne asukɔtweaa, sukyerɛmma ne omununkum, mframa a ano yɛ den a mutie ne nne nyinaa.

9.verse: Kamfo no, nkoko ne mmepɔw, nnua a ɛsow aba ne kwae,

10.verse: mmoa nyinaa, wɔn a wodwo ne wɔn a wɔkeka, wɔn a wɔwea fam ne nnomaa.

11.verse: Kamfo no, ahene ne nnipa, ahenemmabarima ne wɔn a wodi ahene nyinaa,

12.verse: mmeawa ne mmerante, mmasiriwa ne mmofra nso.

13.verse: Ma wɔn nyinaa nkamfo Awurade din! Ne din so sen edin biara; n’anuonyam korɔn sen asase ne soro.

14.verse: Ɔmaa ne man ahoɔden enti ne mamfo nyinaa kamfo no; nnipa a wɔwɔ Israel a ɔpɛ wɔn asɛm no. Kamfo Awurade!

1.verse: Ayeyi dwom - Kamfo Awurade. To dwom foforo ma Awurade. Kamfo no wɔ ne gyidifo bagua mu.

2.verse: Ma w’ani nnye, Israel, wo boafo nti. Momma mo ani nnye, Sionfo, esiane mo hene nti!

3.verse: Momfa asaw nkamfo ne din. Mommɔ nkyene ne nsanku nkamfo ne din.

4.verse: Awurade ani gye ne nkurɔfo ho. Ɔma ɔhobrɛaseni di nkonim de hyɛ no anuonyam.

5.verse: Momma Onyankopɔn ani nnye wɔ wɔn nkonimdi mu na wɔnto ahosɛpɛw nnwom anadwo mu nyinaa.

6.verse: Wɔrekamfo Onyankopɔn no, wɔnteɛm dennen bere a wokita wɔn nkrante nnamnnam no a,

7.verse: wɔde bedi aman so na wɔatwe nnipa aso

8.verse: na wɔakyekyere ahene wɔ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu, wɔn mpanyimfo daban nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu,

9.verse: na wɔatwe aman aso sɛnea Onyankopɔn ahyɛ no. Eyi ne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfo nkonimdi. Kamfo Awurade.

1.verse: Kamfo Awurade - Kamfo Awurade! Kamfo Awurade wɔ ne fi! Kamfo ne tumi wɔ soro!

2.verse: Kamfo no wɔ nneɛma akɛse a wayɛ no ho. Kamfo ne kɛseyɛ.

3.verse: Momfa ntorobɛnto nkamfo no. Momfa asanku ne bɛnta nkamfo no.

4.verse: Momfa nkyene ne asaw nkamfo no. Momfa asanku ne mmɛn nkamfo no.

5.verse: Momfa kyɛnkyɛnn nkamfo no. Mommɔ kyɛnkyɛnn dennen nkamfo no.

6.verse: Momma nea ɛhome nyinaa nkamfo Awurade! Kamfo Awurade!
